                     <div class="line">too was no good divinity. When the rain came to</div>
                     <div class="line">wet me once, and the wind to make me chatter; when</div>
                     <div class="line">the thunder would not peace at my bidding; there I</div>
                     <div class="line">found 'em, there I smelt 'em out. Go to, they are</div>
                     <div class="line">not men o' their words: they told me I was every</div>
                     <div class="line">thing; 'tis a lie, I am not ague-proof.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">The trick of that voice I do well remember:</div>
                     <div class="line">Is 't not the king?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, every inch a king:</div>
                     <div class="line">When I do stare, see how the subject quakes.</div>
                     <div class="line">I pardon that man's life. What was thy cause? Adultery?</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou shalt not die: die for adultery! No:</div>
                     <div class="line">The wren goes to 't, and the small gilded fly</div>
                     <div class="line">Does lecher in my sight.</div>
                     <div class="line">Let copulation thrive; for Gloucester's bastard son</div>
                     <div class="line">Was kinder to his father than my daughters</div>
                     <div class="line">Got 'tween the lawful sheets.</div>
                     <div class="line">To 't, luxury, pell-mell! for I lack soldiers.</div>
                     <div class="line">Behold yond simpering dame,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whose face between her forks presages snow;</div>
                     <div class="line">That minces virtue, and does shake the head</div>
                     <div class="line">To hear of pleasure's name;</div>
                     <div class="line">The fitchew, nor the soiled horse, goes to 't</div>
                     <div class="line">With a more riotous appetite.</div>
                     <div class="line">Down from the waist they are Centaurs,</div>
                     <div class="line">Though women all above:</div>
                     <div class="line">But to the girdle do the gods inherit,</div>
                     <div class="line">Beneath is all the fiends';</div>
                     <div class="line">There's hell, there's darkness, there's the</div>
                     <div class="line">sulphurous pit,</div>
                     <div class="line">Burning, scalding, stench, consumption; fie,</div>
                     <div class="line">fie, fie! pah, pah! Give me an ounce of civet,</div>
                     <div class="line">good apothecary, to sweeten my imagination:</div>
                     <div class="line">there's money for thee.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">O, let me kiss that hand!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                     <div class="line">Let me wipe it first; it smells of mortality.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">O ruin'd piece of nature! This great world</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall so wear out to nought. Dost thou know me?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                     <div class="line">I remember thine eyes well enough. Dost thou squiny</div>
                     <div class="line">at me? No, do thy worst, blind Cupid! I'll not</div>
                     <div class="line">love. Read thou this challenge; mark but the</div>
                     <div class="line">penning of it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">Were all the letters suns, I could not see one.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                     <div class="line">I would not take this from report; it is,</div>
                     <div class="line">And my heart breaks at it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                     <div class="line">Read.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">What, with the case of eyes?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                     <div class="line">O, ho, are you there with me? No eyes in your</div>
                     <div class="line">head, nor no money in your purse? Your eyes are in</div>
                     <div class="line">a heavy case, your purse in a light; yet you see how</div>
                     <div class="line">this world goes.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">I see it feelingly.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                     <div class="line">What, art mad? A man may see how this world goes</div>
                     <div class="line">with no eyes. Look with thine ears: see how yond</div>
                     <div class="line">justice rails upon yond simple thief. Hark, in</div>
                     <div class="line">thine ear: change places; and, handy-dandy, which</div>
                     <div class="line">is the justice, which is the thief? Thou hast seen</div>
                     <div class="line">a farmer's dog bark at a beggar?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                     <div class="line">And the creature run from the cur? There thou</div>
                     <div class="line">mightst behold the great image of authority: a</div>
                     <div class="line">dog's obeyed in office.</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou rascal beadle, hold thy bloody hand!</div>
                     <div class="line">Why dost thou lash that whore? Strip thine own back;</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou hotly lust'st to use her in that kind</div>
                     <div class="line">For which thou whipp'st her. The usurer hangs the cozener.</div>
                     <div class="line">Through tatter'd clothes small vices do appear;</div>
                     <div class="line">Robes and furr'd gowns hide all. Plate sin with gold,</div>
                     <div class="line">And the strong lance of justice hurtless breaks:</div>
                     <div class="line">Arm it in rags, a pigmy's straw does pierce it.</div>
                     <div class="line">None does offend, none, I say, none; I'll able 'em:</div>
                     <div class="line">Take that of me, my friend, who have the power</div>
                     <div class="line">To seal the accuser's lips. Get thee glass eyes;</div>
                     <div class="line">And like a scurvy politician, seem</div>
                     <div class="line">To see the things thou dost not. Now, now, now, now:</div>
                     <div class="line">Pull off my boots: harder, harder: so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                     <div class="line">O, matter and impertinency mix'd! Reason in madness!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                     <div class="line">If thou wilt weep my fortunes, take my eyes.</div>
                     <div class="line">I know thee well enough; thy name is Gloucester:</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou must be patient; we came crying hither:</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou know'st, the first time that we smell the air,</div>
                     <div class="line">We wawl and cry. I will preach to thee: mark.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">Alack, alack the day!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                     <div class="line">When we are born, we cry that we are come</div>
                     <div class="line">To this great stage of fools: this a good block;</div>
                     <div class="line">It were a delicate stratagem, to shoe</div>
                     <div class="line">A troop of horse with felt: I'll put 't in proof;</div>
                     <div class="line">And when I have stol'n upon these sons-in-law,</div>
                     <div class="line">Then, kill, kill, kill, kill, kill, kill!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter a Gentleman, with Attendants</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">O, here he is: lay hand upon him. Sir,</div>
                     <div class="line">Your most dear daughter--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                     <div class="line">No rescue? What, a prisoner? I am even</div>
                     <div class="line">The natural fool of fortune. Use me well;</div>
                     <div class="line">You shall have ransom. Let me have surgeons;</div>
                     <div class="line">I am cut to the brains.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">You shall have any thing.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                     <div class="line">No seconds? all myself?</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, this would make a man a man of salt,</div>
                     <div class="line">To use his eyes for garden water-pots,</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, and laying autumn's dust.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">Good sir,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                     <div class="line">I will die bravely, like a bridegroom. What!</div>
                     <div class="line">I will be jovial: come, come; I am a king,</div>
                     <div class="line">My masters, know you that.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">You are a royal one, and we obey you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                     <div class="line">Then there's life in't. Nay, if you get it, you</div>
                     <div class="line">shall get it with running. Sa, sa, sa, sa.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit running; Attendants follow</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">A sight most pitiful in the meanest wretch,</div>
                     <div class="line">Past speaking of in a king! Thou hast one daughter,</div>
                     <div class="line">Who redeems nature from the general curse</div>
                     <div class="line">Which twain have brought her to.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                     <div class="line">Hail, gentle sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, speed you: what's your will?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                     <div class="line">Do you hear aught, sir, of a battle toward?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">Most sure and vulgar: every one hears that,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which can distinguish sound.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                     <div class="line">But, by your favour,</div>
                     <div class="line">How near's the other army?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">Near and on speedy foot; the main descry</div>
                     <div class="line">Stands on the hourly thought.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                     <div class="line">I thank you, sir: that's all.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">Though that the queen on special cause is here,</div>
                     <div class="line">Her army is moved on.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                     <div class="line">I thank you, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit Gentleman</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">You ever-gentle gods, take my breath from me:</div>
                     <div class="line">Let not my worser spirit tempt me again</div>
                     <div class="line">To die before you please!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                     <div class="line">Well pray you, father.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">Now, good sir, what are you?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                     <div class="line">A most poor man, made tame to fortune's blows;</div>
                     <div class="line">Who, by the art of known and feeling sorrows,</div>
                     <div class="line">Am pregnant to good pity. Give me your hand,</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll lead you to some biding.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">Hearty thanks:</div>
                     <div class="line">The bounty and the benison of heaven</div>
                     <div class="line">To boot, and boot!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter OSWALD</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OSWALD</div>
                     <div class="line">A proclaim'd prize! Most happy!</div>
                     <div class="line">That eyeless head of thine was first framed flesh</div>
                     <div class="line">To raise my fortunes. Thou old unhappy traitor,</div>
                     <div class="line">Briefly thyself remember: the sword is out</div>
                     <div class="line">That must destroy thee.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">Now let thy friendly hand</div>
                     <div class="line">Put strength enough to't.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>EDGAR interposes</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OSWALD</div>
                     <div class="line">Wherefore, bold peasant,</div>
                     <div class="line">Darest thou support a publish'd traitor? Hence;</div>
                     <div class="line">Lest that the infection of his fortune take</div>
                     <div class="line">Like hold on thee. Let go his arm.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                     <div class="line">Ch'ill not let go, zir, without vurther 'casion.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OSWALD</div>
                     <div class="line">Let go, slave, or thou diest!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                     <div class="line">Good gentleman, go your gait, and let poor volk</div>
                     <div class="line">pass. An chud ha' bin zwaggered out of my life,</div>
                     <div class="line">'twould not ha' bin zo long as 'tis by a vortnight.</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, come not near th' old man; keep out, che vor</div>
                     <div class="line">ye, or ise try whether your costard or my ballow be</div>
                     <div class="line">the harder: ch'ill be plain with you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OSWALD</div>
                     <div class="line">Out, dunghill!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                     <div class="line">Ch'ill pick your teeth, zir: come; no matter vor</div>
                     <div class="line">your foins.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>They fight, and EDGAR knocks him down</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OSWALD</div>
                     <div class="line">Slave, thou hast slain me: villain, take my purse:</div>
                     <div class="line">If ever thou wilt thrive, bury my body;</div>
                     <div class="line">And give the letters which thou find'st about me</div>
                     <div class="line">To Edmund earl of Gloucester; seek him out</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon the British party: O, untimely death!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Dies</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                     <div class="line">I know thee well: a serviceable villain;</div>
                     <div class="line">As duteous to the vices of thy mistress</div>
                     <div class="line">As badness would desire.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">What, is he dead?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                     <div class="line">Sit you down, father; rest you</div>
                     <div class="line">Let's see these pockets: the letters that he speaks of</div>
                     <div class="line">May be my friends. He's dead; I am only sorry</div>
                     <div class="line">He had no other death's-man. Let us see:</div>
                     <div class="line">Leave, gentle wax; and, manners, blame us not:</div>
                     <div class="line">To know our enemies' minds, we'ld rip their hearts;</div>
                     <div class="line">Their papers, is more lawful.</div>
                     <p>Reads</p>
                     <div class="line">'Let our reciprocal vows be remembered. You have</div>
                     <div class="line">many opportunities to cut him off: if your will</div>
                     <div class="line">want not, time and place will be fruitfully offered.</div>
                     <div class="line">There is nothing done, if he return the conqueror:</div>
                     <div class="line">then am I the prisoner, and his bed my goal; from</div>
                     <div class="line">the loathed warmth whereof deliver me, and supply</div>
                     <div class="line">the place for your labour.</div>
                     <div class="line">'Your--wife, so I would say--</div>
                     <div class="line">'Affectionate servant,</div>
                     <div class="line">'GONERIL.'</div>
                     <div class="line">O undistinguish'd space of woman's will!</div>
                     <div class="line">A plot upon her virtuous husband's life;</div>
                     <div class="line">And the exchange my brother! Here, in the sands,</div>
                     <div class="line">Thee I'll rake up, the post unsanctified</div>
                     <div class="line">Of murderous lechers: and in the mature time</div>
                     <div class="line">With this ungracious paper strike the sight</div>
                     <div class="line">Of the death practised duke: for him 'tis well</div>
                     <div class="line">That of thy death and business I can tell.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">The king is mad: how stiff is my vile sense,</div>
                     <div class="line">That I stand up, and have ingenious feeling</div>
                     <div class="line">Of my huge sorrows! Better I were distract:</div>
                     <div class="line">So should my thoughts be sever'd from my griefs,</div>
                     <div class="line">And woes by wrong imaginations lose</div>
                     <div class="line">The knowledge of themselves.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                     <div class="line">Give me your hand:</div>
                     <p>Drum afar off</p>
                     <div class="line">Far off, methinks, I hear the beaten drum:</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, father, I'll bestow you with a friend.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.6.8">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>7. SCENE VII. A tent in the French camp. LEAR on a bed asleep, soft
                music playing; Gentleman, and others attending.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter CORDELIA, KENT, and Doctor</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CORDELIA</div>
                     <div class="line">O thou good Kent, how shall I live and work,</div>
                     <div class="line">To match thy goodness? My life will be too short,</div>
                     <div class="line">And every measure fail me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                     <div class="line">To be acknowledged, madam, is o'erpaid.</div>
                     <div class="line">All my reports go with the modest truth;</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor more nor clipp'd, but so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CORDELIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Be better suited:</div>
                     <div class="line">These weeds are memories of those worser hours:</div>
                     <div class="line">I prithee, put them off.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                     <div class="line">Pardon me, dear madam;</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet to be known shortens my made intent:</div>
                     <div class="line">My boon I make it, that you know me not</div>
                     <div class="line">Till time and I think meet.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CORDELIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Then be't so, my good lord.</div>
                     <p>To the Doctor</p>
                     <div class="line">How does the king?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Doctor</div>
                     <div class="line">Madam, sleeps still.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CORDELIA</div>
                     <div class="line">O you kind gods,</div>
                     <div class="line">Cure this great breach in his abused nature!</div>
                     <div class="line">The untuned and jarring senses, O, wind up</div>
                     <div class="line">Of this child-changed father!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Doctor</div>
                     <div class="line">So please your majesty</div>
                     <div class="line">That we may wake the king: he hath slept long.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CORDELIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Be govern'd by your knowledge, and proceed</div>
                     <div class="line">I' the sway of your own will. Is he array'd?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, madam; in the heaviness of his sleep</div>
                     <div class="line">We put fresh garments on him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Doctor</div>
                     <div class="line">Be by, good madam, when we do awake him;</div>
                     <div class="line">I doubt not of his temperance.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CORDELIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Very well.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Doctor</div>
                     <div class="line">Please you, draw near. Louder the music there!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CORDELIA</div>
                     <div class="line">O my dear father! Restoration hang</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy medicine on my lips; and let this kiss</div>
                     <div class="line">Repair those violent harms that my two sisters</div>
                     <div class="line">Have in thy reverence made!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                     <div class="line">Kind and dear princess!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CORDELIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Had you not been their father, these white flakes</div>
                     <div class="line">Had challenged pity of them. Was this a face</div>
                     <div class="line">To be opposed against the warring winds?</div>
                     <div class="line">To stand against the deep dread-bolted thunder?</div>
                     <div class="line">In the most terrible and nimble stroke</div>
                     <div class="line">Of quick, cross lightning? to watch--poor perdu!--</div>
                     <div class="line">With this thin helm? Mine enemy's dog,</div>
                     <div class="line">Though he had bit me, should have stood that night</div>
                     <div class="line">Against my fire; and wast thou fain, poor father,</div>
                     <div class="line">To hovel thee with swine, and rogues forlorn,</div>
                     <div class="line">In short and musty straw? Alack, alack!</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis wonder that thy life and wits at once</div>
                     <div class="line">Had not concluded all. He wakes; speak to him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Doctor</div>
                     <div class="line">Madam, do you; 'tis fittest.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CORDELIA</div>
                     <div class="line">How does my royal lord? How fares your majesty?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                     <div class="line">You do me wrong to take me out o' the grave:</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou art a soul in bliss; but I am bound</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon a wheel of fire, that mine own tears</div>
                     <div class="line">Do scald like moulten lead.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CORDELIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, do you know me?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                     <div class="line">You are a spirit, I know: when did you die?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CORDELIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Still, still, far wide!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Doctor</div>
                     <div class="line">He's scarce awake: let him alone awhile.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                     <div class="line">Where have I been? Where am I? Fair daylight?</div>
                     <div class="line">I am mightily abused. I should e'en die with pity,</div>
                     <div class="line">To see another thus. I know not what to say.</div>
                     <div class="line">I will not swear these are my hands: let's see;</div>
                     <div class="line">I feel this pin prick. Would I were assured</div>
                     <div class="line">Of my condition!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CORDELIA</div>
                     <div class="line">O, look upon me, sir,</div>
                     <div class="line">And hold your hands in benediction o'er me:</div>
                     <div class="line">No, sir, you must not kneel.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                     <div class="line">Pray, do not mock me:</div>
                     <div class="line">I am a very foolish fond old man,</div>
                     <div class="line">Fourscore and upward, not an hour more nor less;</div>
                     <div class="line">And, to deal plainly,</div>
                     <div class="line">I fear I am not in my perfect mind.</div>
                     <div class="line">Methinks I should know you, and know this man;</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet I am doubtful for I am mainly ignorant</div>
                     <div class="line">What place this is; and all the skill I have</div>
                     <div class="line">Remembers not these garments; nor I know not</div>
                     <div class="line">Where I did lodge last night. Do not laugh at me;</div>
                     <div class="line">For, as I am a man, I think this lady</div>
                     <div class="line">To be my child Cordelia.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CORDELIA</div>
                     <div class="line">And so I am, I am.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                     <div class="line">Be your tears wet? yes, 'faith. I pray, weep not:</div>
                     <div class="line">If you have poison for me, I will drink it.</div>
                     <div class="line">I know you do not love me; for your sisters</div>
                     <div class="line">Have, as I do remember, done me wrong:</div>
                     <div class="line">You have some cause, they have not.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CORDELIA</div>
                     <div class="line">No cause, no cause.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                     <div class="line">Am I in France?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                     <div class="line">In your own kingdom, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                     <div class="line">Do not abuse me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Doctor</div>
                     <div class="line">Be comforted, good madam: the great rage,</div>
                     <div class="line">You see, is kill'd in him: and yet it is danger</div>
                     <div class="line">To make him even o'er the time he has lost.</div>
                     <div class="line">Desire him to go in; trouble him no more</div>
                     <div class="line">Till further settling.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CORDELIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Will't please your highness walk?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                     <div class="line">You must bear with me:</div>
                     <div class="line">Pray you now, forget and forgive: I am old and
                    foolish.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt all but KENT and Gentleman</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">Holds it true, sir, that the Duke of Cornwall was so
                    slain?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                     <div class="line">Most certain, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">Who is conductor of his people?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                     <div class="line">As 'tis said, the bastard son of Gloucester.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">They say Edgar, his banished son, is with the Earl</div>
                     <div class="line">of Kent in Germany.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                     <div class="line">Report is changeable. 'Tis time to look about; the</div>
                     <div class="line">powers of the kingdom approach apace.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">The arbitrement is like to be bloody. Fare you</div>
                     <div class="line">well, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                     <div class="line">My point and period will be throughly wrought,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or well or ill, as this day's battle's fought.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
            </section>
         </article>
         <article class="chapter" id="R.1.7">
            <header class="chapter-titlepage">
               <h2>Chapter 5. ACT V</h2>
            </header>
            <div class="lists-of-titles">
               <div class="toc">
                  <p>
                     <b>Table of Contents</b>
                  </p>
                  <ul class="toc">
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.7.2">1. SCENE I. The British camp, near Dover.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.7.3">2. SCENE II. A field between the two camps.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.7.4">3. SCENE III. The British camp near Dover.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                  </ul>
               </div>
            </div>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.7.2">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>1. SCENE I. The British camp, near Dover.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter, with drum and colours, EDMUND, REGAN, Gentlemen, and
                Soldiers. EDMUND Know of the duke if his last purpose hold, Or whether since he is
                advised by aught To change the course: he's full of alteration And self-reproving:
                bring his constant pleasure. [To a Gentleman, who goes out</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Our sister's man is certainly miscarried.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis to be doubted, madam.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Now, sweet lord,</div>
                     <div class="line">You know the goodness I intend upon you:</div>
                     <div class="line">Tell me--but truly--but then speak the truth,</div>
                     <div class="line">Do you not love my sister?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                     <div class="line">In honour'd love.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                     <div class="line">But have you never found my brother's way</div>
                     <div class="line">To the forfended place?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                     <div class="line">That thought abuses you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                     <div class="line">I am doubtful that you have been conjunct</div>
                     <div class="line">And bosom'd with her, as far as we call hers.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                     <div class="line">No, by mine honour, madam.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                     <div class="line">I never shall endure her: dear my lord,</div>
                     <div class="line">Be not familiar with her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                     <div class="line">Fear me not:</div>
                     <div class="line">She and the duke her husband!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter, with drum and colours, ALBANY, GONERIL, and Soldiers</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside</span> I had rather lose the
                        battle than that sister</div>
                     <div class="line">Should loosen him and me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                     <div class="line">Our very loving sister, well be-met.</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, this I hear; the king is come to his daughter,</div>
                     <div class="line">With others whom the rigor of our state</div>
                     <div class="line">Forced to cry out. Where I could not be honest,</div>
                     <div class="line">I never yet was valiant: for this business,</div>
                     <div class="line">It toucheth us, as France invades our land,</div>
                     <div class="line">Not bolds the king, with others, whom, I fear,</div>
                     <div class="line">Most just and heavy causes make oppose.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, you speak nobly.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Why is this reason'd?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                     <div class="line">Combine together 'gainst the enemy;</div>
                     <div class="line">For these domestic and particular broils</div>
                     <div class="line">Are not the question here.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                     <div class="line">Let's then determine</div>
                     <div class="line">With the ancient of war on our proceedings.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                     <div class="line">I shall attend you presently at your tent.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Sister, you'll go with us?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                     <div class="line">No.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis most convenient; pray you, go with us.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside</span> O, ho, I know the
                        riddle.--I will go.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>As they are going out, enter EDGAR disguised</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                     <div class="line">If e'er your grace had speech with man so poor,</div>
                     <div class="line">Hear me one word.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll overtake you. Speak.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt all but ALBANY and EDGAR</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                     <div class="line">Before you fight the battle, ope this letter.</div>
                     <div class="line">If you have victory, let the trumpet sound</div>
                     <div class="line">For him that brought it: wretched though I seem,</div>
                     <div class="line">I can produce a champion that will prove</div>
                     <div class="line">What is avouched there. If you miscarry,</div>
                     <div class="line">Your business of the world hath so an end,</div>
                     <div class="line">And machination ceases. Fortune love you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                     <div class="line">Stay till I have read the letter.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                     <div class="line">I was forbid it.</div>
                     <div class="line">When time shall serve, let but the herald cry,</div>
                     <div class="line">And I'll appear again.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, fare thee well: I will o'erlook thy paper.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit EDGAR</p>
               <p>Re-enter EDMUND</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                     <div class="line">The enemy's in view; draw up your powers.</div>
                     <div class="line">Here is the guess of their true strength and forces</div>
                     <div class="line">By diligent discovery; but your haste</div>
                     <div class="line">Is now urged on you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                     <div class="line">We will greet the time.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                     <div class="line">To both these sisters have I sworn my love;</div>
                     <div class="line">Each jealous of the other, as the stung</div>
                     <div class="line">Are of the adder. Which of them shall I take?</div>
                     <div class="line">Both? one? or neither? Neither can be enjoy'd,</div>
                     <div class="line">If both remain alive: to take the widow</div>
                     <div class="line">Exasperates, makes mad her sister Goneril;</div>
                     <div class="line">And hardly shall I carry out my side,</div>
                     <div class="line">Her husband being alive. Now then we'll use</div>
                     <div class="line">His countenance for the battle; which being done,</div>
                     <div class="line">Let her who would be rid of him devise</div>
                     <div class="line">His speedy taking off. As for the mercy</div>
                     <div class="line">Which he intends to Lear and to Cordelia,</div>
                     <div class="line">The battle done, and they within our power,</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall never see his pardon; for my state</div>
                     <div class="line">Stands on me to defend, not to debate.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.7.3">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>2. SCENE II. A field between the two camps.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Alarum within. Enter, with drum and colours, KING LEAR, CORDELIA,
                and Soldiers, over the stage; and exeunt</p>
               <p>Enter EDGAR and GLOUCESTER</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                     <div class="line">Here, father, take the shadow of this tree</div>
                     <div class="line">For your good host; pray that the right may thrive:</div>
                     <div class="line">If ever I return to you again,</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll bring you comfort.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">Grace go with you, sir!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit EDGAR</p>
               <p>Alarum and retreat within. Re-enter EDGAR</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                     <div class="line">Away, old man; give me thy hand; away!</div>
                     <div class="line">King Lear hath lost, he and his daughter ta'en:</div>
                     <div class="line">Give me thy hand; come on.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">No farther, sir; a man may rot even here.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                     <div class="line">What, in ill thoughts again? Men must endure</div>
                     <div class="line">Their going hence, even as their coming hither;</div>
                     <div class="line">Ripeness is all: come on.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">And that's true too.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.7.4">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>3. SCENE III. The British camp near Dover.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter, in conquest, with drum and colours, EDMUND, KING LEAR and
                CORDELIA, prisoners; Captain, Soldiers, &c</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                     <div class="line">Some officers take them away: good guard,</div>
                     <div class="line">Until their greater pleasures first be known</div>
                     <div class="line">That are to censure them.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CORDELIA</div>
                     <div class="line">We are not the first</div>
                     <div class="line">Who, with best meaning, have incurr'd the worst.</div>
                     <div class="line">For thee, oppressed king, am I cast down;</div>
                     <div class="line">Myself could else out-frown false fortune's frown.</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall we not see these daughters and these sisters?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                     <div class="line">No, no, no, no! Come, let's away to prison:</div>
                     <div class="line">We two alone will sing like birds i' the cage:</div>
                     <div class="line">When thou dost ask me blessing, I'll kneel down,</div>
                     <div class="line">And ask of thee forgiveness: so we'll live,</div>
                     <div class="line">And pray, and sing, and tell old tales, and laugh</div>
                     <div class="line">At gilded butterflies, and hear poor rogues</div>
                     <div class="line">Talk of court news; and we'll talk with them too,</div>
                     <div class="line">Who loses and who wins; who's in, who's out;</div>
                     <div class="line">And take upon's the mystery of things,</div>
                     <div class="line">As if we were God's spies: and we'll wear out,</div>
                     <div class="line">In a wall'd prison, packs and sects of great ones,</div>
                     <div class="line">That ebb and flow by the moon.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                     <div class="line">Take them away.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon such sacrifices, my Cordelia,</div>
                     <div class="line">The gods themselves throw incense. Have I caught thee?</div>
                     <div class="line">He that parts us shall bring a brand from heaven,</div>
                     <div class="line">And fire us hence like foxes. Wipe thine eyes;</div>
                     <div class="line">The good-years shall devour them, flesh and fell,</div>
                     <div class="line">Ere they shall make us weep: we'll see 'em starve</div>
                     <div class="line">first. Come.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt KING LEAR and CORDELIA, guarded</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                     <div class="line">Come hither, captain; hark.</div>
                     <div class="line">Take thou this note;</div>
                     <p>Giving a paper</p>
                     <div class="line">go follow them to prison:</div>
                     <div class="line">One step I have advanced thee; if thou dost</div>
                     <div class="line">As this instructs thee, thou dost make thy way</div>
                     <div class="line">To noble fortunes: know thou this, that men</div>
                     <div class="line">Are as the time is: to be tender-minded</div>
                     <div class="line">Does not become a sword: thy great employment</div>
                     <div class="line">Will not bear question; either say thou'lt do 't,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or thrive by other means.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Captain</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll do 't, my lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                     <div class="line">About it; and write happy when thou hast done.</div>
                     <div class="line">Mark, I say, instantly; and carry it so</div>
                     <div class="line">As I have set it down.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Captain</div>
                     <div class="line">I cannot draw a cart, nor eat dried oats;</div>
                     <div class="line">If it be man's work, I'll do 't.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <p>Flourish. Enter ALBANY, GONERIL, REGAN, another Captain, and
                Soldiers</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, you have shown to-day your valiant strain,</div>
                     <div class="line">And fortune led you well: you have the captives</div>
                     <div class="line">That were the opposites of this day's strife:</div>
                     <div class="line">We do require them of you, so to use them</div>
                     <div class="line">As we shall find their merits and our safety</div>
                     <div class="line">May equally determine.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, I thought it fit</div>
                     <div class="line">To send the old and miserable king</div>
                     <div class="line">To some retention and appointed guard;</div>
                     <div class="line">Whose age has charms in it, whose title more,</div>
                     <div class="line">To pluck the common bosom on his side,</div>
                     <div class="line">An turn our impress'd lances in our eyes</div>
                     <div class="line">Which do command them. With him I sent the queen;</div>
                     <div class="line">My reason all the same; and they are ready</div>
                     <div class="line">To-morrow, or at further space, to appear</div>
                     <div class="line">Where you shall hold your session. At this time</div>
                     <div class="line">We sweat and bleed: the friend hath lost his friend;</div>
                     <div class="line">And the best quarrels, in the heat, are cursed</div>
                     <div class="line">By those that feel their sharpness:</div>
                     <div class="line">The question of Cordelia and her father</div>
                     <div class="line">Requires a fitter place.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, by your patience,</div>
                     <div class="line">I hold you but a subject of this war,</div>
                     <div class="line">Not as a brother.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                     <div class="line">That's as we list to grace him.</div>
                     <div class="line">Methinks our pleasure might have been demanded,</div>
                     <div class="line">Ere you had spoke so far. He led our powers;</div>
                     <div class="line">Bore the commission of my place and person;</div>
                     <div class="line">The which immediacy may well stand up,</div>
                     <div class="line">And call itself your brother.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                     <div class="line">Not so hot:</div>
                     <div class="line">In his own grace he doth exalt himself,</div>
                     <div class="line">More than in your addition.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                     <div class="line">In my rights,</div>
                     <div class="line">By me invested, he compeers the best.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                     <div class="line">That were the most, if he should husband you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Jesters do oft prove prophets.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                     <div class="line">Holla, holla!</div>
                     <div class="line">That eye that told you so look'd but a-squint.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Lady, I am not well; else I should answer</div>
                     <div class="line">From a full-flowing stomach. General,</div>
                     <div class="line">Take thou my soldiers, prisoners, patrimony;</div>
                     <div class="line">Dispose of them, of me; the walls are thine:</div>
                     <div class="line">Witness the world, that I create thee here</div>
                     <div class="line">My lord and master.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                     <div class="line">Mean you to enjoy him?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                     <div class="line">The let-alone lies not in your good will.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor in thine, lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                     <div class="line">Half-blooded fellow, yes.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>To EDMUND</span> Let the drum
                        strike, and prove my title thine.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                     <div class="line">Stay yet; hear reason. Edmund, I arrest thee</div>
                     <div class="line">On capital treason; and, in thine attaint,</div>
                     <div class="line">This gilded serpent</div>
                     <p>Pointing to Goneril</p>
                     <div class="line">For your claim, fair sister,</div>
                     <div class="line">I bar it in the interest of my wife:</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis she is sub-contracted to this lord,</div>
                     <div class="line">And I, her husband, contradict your bans.</div>
                     <div class="line">If you will marry, make your loves to me,</div>
                     <div class="line">My lady is bespoke.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                     <div class="line">An interlude!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou art arm'd, Gloucester: let the trumpet sound:</div>
                     <div class="line">If none appear to prove upon thy head</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy heinous, manifest, and many treasons,</div>
                     <div class="line">There is my pledge;</div>
                     <p>Throwing down a glove</p>
                     <div class="line">I'll prove it on thy heart,</div>
                     <div class="line">Ere I taste bread, thou art in nothing less</div>
                     <div class="line">Than I have here proclaim'd thee.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Sick, O, sick!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside</span> If not, I'll ne'er
                        trust medicine.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                     <div class="line">There's my exchange:</div>
                     <p>Throwing down a glove</p>
                     <div class="line">what in the world he is</div>
                     <div class="line">That names me traitor, villain-like he lies:</div>
                     <div class="line">Call by thy trumpet: he that dares approach,</div>
                     <div class="line">On him, on you, who not? I will maintain</div>
                     <div class="line">My truth and honour firmly.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                     <div class="line">A herald, ho!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                     <div class="line">A herald, ho, a herald!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                     <div class="line">Trust to thy single virtue; for thy soldiers,</div>
                     <div class="line">All levied in my name, have in my name</div>
                     <div class="line">Took their discharge.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                     <div class="line">My sickness grows upon me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                     <div class="line">She is not well; convey her to my tent.</div>
                     <p>Exit Regan, led</p>
                     <p>Enter a Herald</p>
                     <div class="line">Come hither, herald,--Let the trumpet sound,</div>
                     <div class="line">And read out this.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Captain</div>
                     <div class="line">Sound, trumpet!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>A trumpet sounds</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Herald</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Reads</span> 'If any man of
                        quality or degree within</div>
                     <div class="line">the lists of the army will maintain upon Edmund,</div>
                     <div class="line">supposed Earl of Gloucester, that he is a manifold</div>
                     <div class="line">traitor, let him appear by the third sound of the</div>
