                              <div class="line">and ladies too, they will not let me have all fool</div>
                              <div class="line">to myself; they'll be snatching. Give me an egg,</div>
                              <div class="line">nuncle, and I'll give thee two crowns.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">What two crowns shall they be?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fool</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, after I have cut the egg i' the middle, and eat</div>
                              <div class="line">up the meat, the two crowns of the egg. When thou</div>
                              <div class="line">clovest thy crown i' the middle, and gavest away</div>
                              <div class="line">both parts, thou borest thy ass on thy back o'er</div>
                              <div class="line">the dirt: thou hadst little wit in thy bald crown,</div>
                              <div class="line">when thou gavest thy golden one away. If I speak</div>
                              <div class="line">like myself in this, let him be whipped that first</div>
                              <div class="line">finds it so.</div>
                              <p>Singing</p>
                              <div class="line">Fools had ne'er less wit in a year;</div>
                              <div class="line">For wise men are grown foppish,</div>
                              <div class="line">They know not how their wits to wear,</div>
                              <div class="line">Their manners are so apish.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">When were you wont to be so full of songs, sirrah?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fool</div>
                              <div class="line">I have used it, nuncle, ever since thou madest thy</div>
                              <div class="line">daughters thy mothers: for when thou gavest them</div>
                              <div class="line">the rod, and put'st down thine own breeches,</div>
                              <p>Singing</p>
                              <div class="line">Then they for sudden joy did weep,</div>
                              <div class="line">And I for sorrow sung,</div>
                              <div class="line">That such a king should play bo-peep,</div>
                              <div class="line">And go the fools among.</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, nuncle, keep a schoolmaster that can teach</div>
                              <div class="line">thy fool to lie: I would fain learn to lie.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">An you lie, sirrah, we'll have you whipped.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fool</div>
                              <div class="line">I marvel what kin thou and thy daughters are:</div>
                              <div class="line">they'll have me whipped for speaking true, thou'lt</div>
                              <div class="line">have me whipped for lying; and sometimes I am</div>
                              <div class="line">whipped for holding my peace. I had rather be any</div>
                              <div class="line">kind o' thing than a fool: and yet I would not be</div>
                              <div class="line">thee, nuncle; thou hast pared thy wit o' both sides,</div>
                              <div class="line">and left nothing i' the middle: here comes one o'</div>
                              <div class="line">the parings.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter GONERIL</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, daughter! what makes that frontlet on?</div>
                              <div class="line">Methinks you are too much of late i' the frown.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fool</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou wast a pretty fellow when thou hadst no need to</div>
                              <div class="line">care for her frowning; now thou art an O without a</div>
                              <div class="line">figure: I am better than thou art now; I am a fool,</div>
                              <div class="line">thou art nothing.</div>
                              <p>To GONERIL</p>
                              <div class="line">Yes, forsooth, I will hold my tongue; so your face</div>
                              <div class="line">bids me, though you say nothing. Mum, mum,</div>
                              <div class="line">He that keeps nor crust nor crum,</div>
                              <div class="line">Weary of all, shall want some.</div>
                              <p>Pointing to KING LEAR</p>
                              <div class="line">That's a shealed peascod.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">Not only, sir, this your all-licensed fool,</div>
                              <div class="line">But other of your insolent retinue</div>
                              <div class="line">Do hourly carp and quarrel; breaking forth</div>
                              <div class="line">In rank and not-to-be endured riots. Sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">I had thought, by making this well known unto you,</div>
                              <div class="line">To have found a safe redress; but now grow fearful,</div>
                              <div class="line">By what yourself too late have spoke and done.</div>
                              <div class="line">That you protect this course, and put it on</div>
                              <div class="line">By your allowance; which if you should, the fault</div>
                              <div class="line">Would not 'scape censure, nor the redresses sleep,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which, in the tender of a wholesome weal,</div>
                              <div class="line">Might in their working do you that offence,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which else were shame, that then necessity</div>
                              <div class="line">Will call discreet proceeding.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fool</div>
                              <div class="line">For, you trow, nuncle,</div>
                              <div class="line">The hedge-sparrow fed the cuckoo so long,</div>
                              <div class="line">That it's had it head bit off by it young.</div>
                              <div class="line">So, out went the candle, and we were left darkling.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Are you our daughter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">I would you would make use of that good wisdom,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whereof I know you are fraught; and put away</div>
                              <div class="line">These dispositions, that of late transform you</div>
                              <div class="line">From what you rightly are.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fool</div>
                              <div class="line">May not an ass know when the cart</div>
                              <div class="line">draws the horse? Whoop, Jug! I love thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Doth any here know me? This is not Lear:</div>
                              <div class="line">Doth Lear walk thus? speak thus? Where are his eyes?</div>
                              <div class="line">Either his notion weakens, his discernings</div>
                              <div class="line">Are lethargied--Ha! waking? 'tis not so.</div>
                              <div class="line">Who is it that can tell me who I am?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fool</div>
                              <div class="line">Lear's shadow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">I would learn that; for, by the</div>
                              <div class="line">marks of sovereignty, knowledge, and reason,</div>
                              <div class="line">I should be false persuaded I had daughters.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fool</div>
                              <div class="line">Which they will make an obedient father.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Your name, fair gentlewoman?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">This admiration, sir, is much o' the savour</div>
                              <div class="line">Of other your new pranks. I do beseech you</div>
                              <div class="line">To understand my purposes aright:</div>
                              <div class="line">As you are old and reverend, you should be wise.</div>
                              <div class="line">Here do you keep a hundred knights and squires;</div>
                              <div class="line">Men so disorder'd, so debosh'd and bold,</div>
                              <div class="line">That this our court, infected with their manners,</div>
                              <div class="line">Shows like a riotous inn: epicurism and lust</div>
                              <div class="line">Make it more like a tavern or a brothel</div>
                              <div class="line">Than a graced palace. The shame itself doth speak</div>
                              <div class="line">For instant remedy: be then desired</div>
                              <div class="line">By her, that else will take the thing she begs,</div>
                              <div class="line">A little to disquantity your train;</div>
                              <div class="line">And the remainder, that shall still depend,</div>
                              <div class="line">To be such men as may besort your age,</div>
                              <div class="line">And know themselves and you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Darkness and devils!</div>
                              <div class="line">Saddle my horses; call my train together:</div>
                              <div class="line">Degenerate bastard! I'll not trouble thee.</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet have I left a daughter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">You strike my people; and your disorder'd rabble</div>
                              <div class="line">Make servants of their betters.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter ALBANY</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Woe, that too late repents,--</div>
                              <p>To ALBANY</p>
                              <div class="line">O, sir, are you come?</div>
                              <div class="line">Is it your will? Speak, sir. Prepare my horses.</div>
                              <div class="line">Ingratitude, thou marble-hearted fiend,</div>
                              <div class="line">More hideous when thou show'st thee in a child</div>
                              <div class="line">Than the sea-monster!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray, sir, be patient.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>To GONERIL</span> Detested kite!
                        thou liest.</div>
                              <div class="line">My train are men of choice and rarest parts,</div>
                              <div class="line">That all particulars of duty know,</div>
                              <div class="line">And in the most exact regard support</div>
                              <div class="line">The worships of their name. O most small fault,</div>
                              <div class="line">How ugly didst thou in Cordelia show!</div>
                              <div class="line">That, like an engine, wrench'd my frame of nature</div>
                              <div class="line">From the fix'd place; drew from heart all love,</div>
                              <div class="line">And added to the gall. O Lear, Lear, Lear!</div>
                              <div class="line">Beat at this gate, that let thy folly in,</div>
                              <p>Striking his head</p>
                              <div class="line">And thy dear judgment out! Go, go, my people.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, I am guiltless, as I am ignorant</div>
                              <div class="line">Of what hath moved you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">It may be so, my lord.</div>
                              <div class="line">Hear, nature, hear; dear goddess, hear!</div>
                              <div class="line">Suspend thy purpose, if thou didst intend</div>
                              <div class="line">To make this creature fruitful!</div>
                              <div class="line">Into her womb convey sterility!</div>
                              <div class="line">Dry up in her the organs of increase;</div>
                              <div class="line">And from her derogate body never spring</div>
                              <div class="line">A babe to honour her! If she must teem,</div>
                              <div class="line">Create her child of spleen; that it may live,</div>
                              <div class="line">And be a thwart disnatured torment to her!</div>
                              <div class="line">Let it stamp wrinkles in her brow of youth;</div>
                              <div class="line">With cadent tears fret channels in her cheeks;</div>
                              <div class="line">Turn all her mother's pains and benefits</div>
                              <div class="line">To laughter and contempt; that she may feel</div>
                              <div class="line">How sharper than a serpent's tooth it is</div>
                              <div class="line">To have a thankless child! Away, away!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, gods that we adore, whereof comes this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">Never afflict yourself to know the cause;</div>
                              <div class="line">But let his disposition have that scope</div>
                              <div class="line">That dotage gives it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter KING LEAR</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">What, fifty of my followers at a clap!</div>
                              <div class="line">Within a fortnight!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">What's the matter, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll tell thee:</div>
                              <p>To GONERIL</p>
                              <div class="line">Life and death! I am ashamed</div>
                              <div class="line">That thou hast power to shake my manhood thus;</div>
                              <div class="line">That these hot tears, which break from me perforce,</div>
                              <div class="line">Should make thee worth them. Blasts and fogs upon thee!</div>
                              <div class="line">The untented woundings of a father's curse</div>
                              <div class="line">Pierce every sense about thee! Old fond eyes,</div>
                              <div class="line">Beweep this cause again, I'll pluck ye out,</div>
                              <div class="line">And cast you, with the waters that you lose,</div>
                              <div class="line">To temper clay. Yea, it is come to this?</div>
                              <div class="line">Let is be so: yet have I left a daughter,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who, I am sure, is kind and comfortable:</div>
                              <div class="line">When she shall hear this of thee, with her nails</div>
                              <div class="line">She'll flay thy wolvish visage. Thou shalt find</div>
                              <div class="line">That I'll resume the shape which thou dost think</div>
                              <div class="line">I have cast off for ever: thou shalt,</div>
                              <div class="line">I warrant thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt KING LEAR, KENT, and Attendants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you mark that, my lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">I cannot be so partial, Goneril,</div>
                              <div class="line">To the great love I bear you,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray you, content. What, Oswald, ho!</div>
                              <p>To the Fool</p>
                              <div class="line">You, sir, more knave than fool, after your master.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fool</div>
                              <div class="line">Nuncle Lear, nuncle Lear, tarry and take the fool</div>
                              <div class="line">with thee.</div>
                              <div class="line">A fox, when one has caught her,</div>
                              <div class="line">And such a daughter,</div>
                              <div class="line">Should sure to the slaughter,</div>
                              <div class="line">If my cap would buy a halter:</div>
                              <div class="line">So the fool follows after.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">This man hath had good counsel:--a hundred knights!</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis politic and safe to let him keep</div>
                              <div class="line">At point a hundred knights: yes, that, on every dream,</div>
                              <div class="line">Each buzz, each fancy, each complaint, dislike,</div>
                              <div class="line">He may enguard his dotage with their powers,</div>
                              <div class="line">And hold our lives in mercy. Oswald, I say!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, you may fear too far.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">Safer than trust too far:</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me still take away the harms I fear,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not fear still to be taken: I know his heart.</div>
                              <div class="line">What he hath utter'd I have writ my sister</div>
                              <div class="line">If she sustain him and his hundred knights</div>
                              <div class="line">When I have show'd the unfitness,--</div>
                              <p>Re-enter OSWALD</p>
                              <div class="line">How now, Oswald!</div>
                              <div class="line">What, have you writ that letter to my sister?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OSWALD</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, madam.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">Take you some company, and away to horse:</div>
                              <div class="line">Inform her full of my particular fear;</div>
                              <div class="line">And thereto add such reasons of your own</div>
                              <div class="line">As may compact it more. Get you gone;</div>
                              <div class="line">And hasten your return.</div>
                              <p>Exit OSWALD</p>
                              <div class="line">No, no, my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">This milky gentleness and course of yours</div>
                              <div class="line">Though I condemn not, yet, under pardon,</div>
                              <div class="line">You are much more attask'd for want of wisdom</div>
                              <div class="line">Than praised for harmful mildness.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">How far your eyes may pierce I can not tell:</div>
                              <div class="line">Striving to better, oft we mar what's well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, then--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, well; the event.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.3.6">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>5. SCENE V. Court before the same.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter KING LEAR, KENT, and Fool</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Go you before to Gloucester with these letters.</div>
                              <div class="line">Acquaint my daughter no further with any thing you</div>
                              <div class="line">know than comes from her demand out of the letter.</div>
                              <div class="line">If your diligence be not speedy, I shall be there afore
                    you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">I will not sleep, my lord, till I have delivered</div>
                              <div class="line">your letter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fool</div>
                              <div class="line">If a man's brains were in's heels, were't not in</div>
                              <div class="line">danger of kibes?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, boy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fool</div>
                              <div class="line">Then, I prithee, be merry; thy wit shall ne'er go</div>
                              <div class="line">slip-shod.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha, ha, ha!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fool</div>
                              <div class="line">Shalt see thy other daughter will use thee kindly;</div>
                              <div class="line">for though she's as like this as a crab's like an</div>
                              <div class="line">apple, yet I can tell what I can tell.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, what canst thou tell, my boy?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fool</div>
                              <div class="line">She will taste as like this as a crab does to a</div>
                              <div class="line">crab. Thou canst tell why one's nose stands i'</div>
                              <div class="line">the middle on's face?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">No.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fool</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, to keep one's eyes of either side's nose; that</div>
                              <div class="line">what a man cannot smell out, he may spy into.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">I did her wrong--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fool</div>
                              <div class="line">Canst tell how an oyster makes his shell?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">No.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fool</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor I neither; but I can tell why a snail has a house.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Why?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fool</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, to put his head in; not to give it away to his</div>
                              <div class="line">daughters, and leave his horns without a case.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">I will forget my nature. So kind a father! Be my</div>
                              <div class="line">horses ready?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fool</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy asses are gone about 'em. The reason why the</div>
                              <div class="line">seven stars are no more than seven is a pretty reason.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Because they are not eight?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fool</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, indeed: thou wouldst make a good fool.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">To take 't again perforce! Monster ingratitude!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fool</div>
                              <div class="line">If thou wert my fool, nuncle, I'ld have thee beaten</div>
                              <div class="line">for being old before thy time.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">How's that?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fool</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou shouldst not have been old till thou hadst</div>
                              <div class="line">been wise.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">O, let me not be mad, not mad, sweet heaven</div>
                              <div class="line">Keep me in temper: I would not be mad!</div>
                              <p>Enter Gentleman</p>
                              <div class="line">How now! are the horses ready?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Ready, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, boy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fool</div>
                              <div class="line">She that's a maid now, and laughs at my departure,</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall not be a maid long, unless things be cut
                    shorter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.4">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 2. ACT II</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.2">1. SCENE I. GLOUCESTER's castle.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.3">2. SCENE II. Before Gloucester's castle.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.4">3. SCENE III. A wood.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.5">4. SCENE IV. Before GLOUCESTER's castle. KENT in the stocks.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I. GLOUCESTER's castle.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter EDMUND, and CURAN meets him</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">Save thee, Curan.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CURAN</div>
                              <div class="line">And you, sir. I have been with your father, and</div>
                              <div class="line">given him notice that the Duke of Cornwall and Regan</div>
                              <div class="line">his duchess will be here with him this night.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">How comes that?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CURAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, I know not. You have heard of the news abroad;</div>
                              <div class="line">I mean the whispered ones, for they are yet but</div>
                              <div class="line">ear-kissing arguments?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">Not I pray you, what are they?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CURAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Have you heard of no likely wars toward, 'twixt the</div>
                              <div class="line">Dukes of Cornwall and Albany?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">Not a word.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CURAN</div>
                              <div class="line">You may do, then, in time. Fare you well, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">The duke be here to-night? The better! best!</div>
                              <div class="line">This weaves itself perforce into my business.</div>
                              <div class="line">My father hath set guard to take my brother;</div>
                              <div class="line">And I have one thing, of a queasy question,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which I must act: briefness and fortune, work!</div>
                              <div class="line">Brother, a word; descend: brother, I say!</div>
                              <p>Enter EDGAR</p>
                              <div class="line">My father watches: O sir, fly this place;</div>
                              <div class="line">Intelligence is given where you are hid;</div>
                              <div class="line">You have now the good advantage of the night:</div>
                              <div class="line">Have you not spoken 'gainst the Duke of Cornwall?</div>
                              <div class="line">He's coming hither: now, i' the night, i' the haste,</div>
                              <div class="line">And Regan with him: have you nothing said</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon his party 'gainst the Duke of Albany?</div>
                              <div class="line">Advise yourself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">I am sure on't, not a word.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">I hear my father coming: pardon me:</div>
                              <div class="line">In cunning I must draw my sword upon you</div>
                              <div class="line">Draw; seem to defend yourself; now quit you well.</div>
                              <div class="line">Yield: come before my father. Light, ho, here!</div>
                              <div class="line">Fly, brother. Torches, torches! So, farewell.</div>
                              <p>Exit EDGAR</p>
                              <div class="line">Some blood drawn on me would beget opinion.</div>
                              <p>Wounds his arm</p>
                              <div class="line">Of my more fierce endeavour: I have seen drunkards</div>
                              <div class="line">Do more than this in sport. Father, father!</div>
                              <div class="line">Stop, stop! No help?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter GLOUCESTER, and Servants with torches</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, Edmund, where's the villain?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">Here stood he in the dark, his sharp sword out,</div>
                              <div class="line">Mumbling of wicked charms, conjuring the moon</div>
                              <div class="line">To stand auspicious mistress,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">But where is he?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">Look, sir, I bleed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Where is the villain, Edmund?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">Fled this way, sir. When by no means he could--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Pursue him, ho! Go after.</div>
                              <p>Exeunt some Servants</p>
                              <div class="line">By no means what?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">Persuade me to the murder of your lordship;</div>
                              <div class="line">But that I told him, the revenging gods</div>
                              <div class="line">'Gainst parricides did all their thunders bend;</div>
                              <div class="line">Spoke, with how manifold and strong a bond</div>
                              <div class="line">The child was bound to the father; sir, in fine,</div>
                              <div class="line">Seeing how loathly opposite I stood</div>
                              <div class="line">To his unnatural purpose, in fell motion,</div>
                              <div class="line">With his prepared sword, he charges home</div>
                              <div class="line">My unprovided body, lanced mine arm:</div>
                              <div class="line">But when he saw my best alarum'd spirits,</div>
                              <div class="line">Bold in the quarrel's right, roused to the encounter,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or whether gasted by the noise I made,</div>
                              <div class="line">Full suddenly he fled.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Let him fly far:</div>
                              <div class="line">Not in this land shall he remain uncaught;</div>
                              <div class="line">And found--dispatch. The noble duke my master,</div>
                              <div class="line">My worthy arch and patron, comes to-night:</div>
                              <div class="line">By his authority I will proclaim it,</div>
                              <div class="line">That he which finds him shall deserve our thanks,</div>
                              <div class="line">Bringing the murderous coward to the stake;</div>
                              <div class="line">He that conceals him, death.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">When I dissuaded him from his intent,</div>
                              <div class="line">And found him pight to do it, with curst speech</div>
                              <div class="line">I threaten'd to discover him: he replied,</div>
                              <div class="line">'Thou unpossessing bastard! dost thou think,</div>
                              <div class="line">If I would stand against thee, would the reposal</div>
                              <div class="line">Of any trust, virtue, or worth in thee</div>
                              <div class="line">Make thy words faith'd? No: what I should deny,--</div>
                              <div class="line">As this I would: ay, though thou didst produce</div>
                              <div class="line">My very character,--I'ld turn it all</div>
                              <div class="line">To thy suggestion, plot, and damned practise:</div>
                              <div class="line">And thou must make a dullard of the world,</div>
                              <div class="line">If they not thought the profits of my death</div>
                              <div class="line">Were very pregnant and potential spurs</div>
                              <div class="line">To make thee seek it.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Strong and fasten'd villain</div>
                              <div class="line">Would he deny his letter? I never got him.</div>
                              <p>Tucket within</p>
                              <div class="line">Hark, the duke's trumpets! I know not why he comes.</div>
                              <div class="line">All ports I'll bar; the villain shall not 'scape;</div>
                              <div class="line">The duke must grant me that: besides, his picture</div>
                              <div class="line">I will send far and near, that all the kingdom</div>
                              <div class="line">May have the due note of him; and of my land,</div>
                              <div class="line">Loyal and natural boy, I'll work the means</div>
                              <div class="line">To make thee capable.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter CORNWALL, REGAN, and Attendants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORNWALL</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, my noble friend! since I came hither,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which I can call but now, I have heard strange news.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">If it be true, all vengeance comes too short</div>
                              <div class="line">Which can pursue the offender. How dost, my lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">O, madam, my old heart is crack'd, it's crack'd!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">What, did my father's godson seek your life?</div>
                              <div class="line">He whom my father named? your Edgar?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">O, lady, lady, shame would have it hid!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Was he not companion with the riotous knights</div>
                              <div class="line">That tend upon my father?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">I know not, madam: 'tis too bad, too bad.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, madam, he was of that consort.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">No marvel, then, though he were ill affected:</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis they have put him on the old man's death,</div>
                              <div class="line">To have the expense and waste of his revenues.</div>
                              <div class="line">I have this present evening from my sister</div>
                              <div class="line">Been well inform'd of them; and with such cautions,</div>
                              <div class="line">That if they come to sojourn at my house,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll not be there.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORNWALL</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor I, assure thee, Regan.</div>
                              <div class="line">Edmund, I hear that you have shown your father</div>
                              <div class="line">A child-like office.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twas my duty, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">He did bewray his practise; and received</div>
                              <div class="line">This hurt you see, striving to apprehend him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORNWALL</div>
                              <div class="line">Is he pursued?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, my good lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORNWALL</div>
                              <div class="line">If he be taken, he shall never more</div>
                              <div class="line">Be fear'd of doing harm: make your own purpose,</div>
                              <div class="line">How in my strength you please. For you, Edmund,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose virtue and obedience doth this instant</div>
                              <div class="line">So much commend itself, you shall be ours:</div>
                              <div class="line">Natures of such deep trust we shall much need;</div>
                              <div class="line">You we first seize on.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall serve you, sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">Truly, however else.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">For him I thank your grace.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORNWALL</div>
                              <div class="line">You know not why we came to visit you,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Thus out of season, threading dark-eyed night:</div>
                              <div class="line">Occasions, noble Gloucester, of some poise,</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherein we must have use of your advice:</div>
                              <div class="line">Our father he hath writ, so hath our sister,</div>
                              <div class="line">Of differences, which I least thought it fit</div>
                              <div class="line">To answer from our home; the several messengers</div>
                              <div class="line">From hence attend dispatch. Our good old friend,</div>
                              <div class="line">Lay comforts to your bosom; and bestow</div>
                              <div class="line">Your needful counsel to our business,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which craves the instant use.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">I serve you, madam:</div>
                              <div class="line">Your graces are right welcome.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II. Before Gloucester's castle.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter KENT and OSWALD, severally</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OSWALD</div>
                              <div class="line">Good dawning to thee, friend: art of this house?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OSWALD</div>
                              <div class="line">Where may we set our horses?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">I' the mire.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OSWALD</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, if thou lovest me, tell me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">I love thee not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OSWALD</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, then, I care not for thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">If I had thee in Lipsbury pinfold, I would make thee</div>
                              <div class="line">care for me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OSWALD</div>
                              <div class="line">Why dost thou use me thus? I know thee not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">Fellow, I know thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OSWALD</div>
                              <div class="line">What dost thou know me for?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">A knave; a rascal; an eater of broken meats; a</div>
                              <div class="line">base, proud, shallow, beggarly, three-suited,</div>
                              <div class="line">hundred-pound, filthy, worsted-stocking knave; a</div>
                              <div class="line">lily-livered, action-taking knave, a whoreson,</div>
                              <div class="line">glass-gazing, super-serviceable finical rogue;</div>
                              <div class="line">one-trunk-inheriting slave; one that wouldst be a</div>
                              <div class="line">bawd, in way of good service, and art nothing but</div>
                              <div class="line">the composition of a knave, beggar, coward, pandar,</div>
                              <div class="line">and the son and heir of a mongrel bitch: one whom I</div>
                              <div class="line">will beat into clamorous whining, if thou deniest</div>
                              <div class="line">the least syllable of thy addition.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OSWALD</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, what a monstrous fellow art thou, thus to rail</div>
                              <div class="line">on one that is neither known of thee nor knows thee!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">What a brazen-faced varlet art thou, to deny thou</div>
                              <div class="line">knowest me! Is it two days ago since I tripped up</div>
                              <div class="line">thy heels, and beat thee before the king? Draw, you</div>
                              <div class="line">rogue: for, though it be night, yet the moon</div>
                              <div class="line">shines; I'll make a sop o' the moonshine of you:</div>
                              <div class="line">draw, you whoreson cullionly barber-monger, draw.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Drawing his sword</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OSWALD</div>
                              <div class="line">Away! I have nothing to do with thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">Draw, you rascal: you come with letters against the</div>
                              <div class="line">king; and take vanity the puppet's part against the</div>
                              <div class="line">royalty of her father: draw, you rogue, or I'll so</div>
                              <div class="line">carbonado your shanks: draw, you rascal; come your
                    ways.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OSWALD</div>
                              <div class="line">Help, ho! murder! help!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">Strike, you slave; stand, rogue, stand; you neat</div>
                              <div class="line">slave, strike.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Beating him</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OSWALD</div>
                              <div class="line">Help, ho! murder! murder!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter EDMUND, with his rapier drawn, CORNWALL, REGAN, GLOUCESTER,
                and Servants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">How now! What's the matter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">With you, goodman boy, an you please: come, I'll</div>
                              <div class="line">flesh ye; come on, young master.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Weapons! arms! What 's the matter here?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORNWALL</div>
                              <div class="line">Keep peace, upon your lives:</div>
                              <div class="line">He dies that strikes again. What is the matter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">The messengers from our sister and the king.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORNWALL</div>
                              <div class="line">What is your difference? speak.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OSWALD</div>
                              <div class="line">I am scarce in breath, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">No marvel, you have so bestirred your valour. You</div>
                              <div class="line">cowardly rascal, nature disclaims in thee: a</div>
                              <div class="line">tailor made thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORNWALL</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art a strange fellow: a tailor make a man?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, a tailor, sir: a stone-cutter or painter could</div>
                              <div class="line">not have made him so ill, though he had been but two</div>
                              <div class="line">hours at the trade.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORNWALL</div>
                              <div class="line">Speak yet, how grew your quarrel?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OSWALD</div>
                              <div class="line">This ancient ruffian, sir, whose life I have spared</div>
                              <div class="line">at suit of his gray beard,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou whoreson zed! thou unnecessary letter! My</div>
