                              <div class="line">When that which makes me bend makes the king bow,</div>
                              <div class="line">He childed as I father'd! Tom, away!</div>
                              <div class="line">Mark the high noises; and thyself bewray,</div>
                              <div class="line">When false opinion, whose wrong thought defiles thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">In thy just proof, repeals and reconciles thee.</div>
                              <div class="line">What will hap more to-night, safe 'scape the king!</div>
                              <div class="line">Lurk, lurk.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.8">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>7. SCENE VII. Gloucester's castle.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter CORNWALL, REGAN, GONERIL, EDMUND, and Servants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORNWALL</div>
                              <div class="line">Post speedily to my lord your husband; show him</div>
                              <div class="line">this letter: the army of France is landed. Seek</div>
                              <div class="line">out the villain Gloucester.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt some of the Servants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Hang him instantly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">Pluck out his eyes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORNWALL</div>
                              <div class="line">Leave him to my displeasure. Edmund, keep you our</div>
                              <div class="line">sister company: the revenges we are bound to take</div>
                              <div class="line">upon your traitorous father are not fit for your</div>
                              <div class="line">beholding. Advise the duke, where you are going, to</div>
                              <div class="line">a most festinate preparation: we are bound to the</div>
                              <div class="line">like. Our posts shall be swift and intelligent</div>
                              <div class="line">betwixt us. Farewell, dear sister: farewell, my</div>
                              <div class="line">lord of Gloucester.</div>
                              <p>Enter OSWALD</p>
                              <div class="line">How now! where's the king?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OSWALD</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord of Gloucester hath convey'd him hence:</div>
                              <div class="line">Some five or six and thirty of his knights,</div>
                              <div class="line">Hot questrists after him, met him at gate;</div>
                              <div class="line">Who, with some other of the lords dependants,</div>
                              <div class="line">Are gone with him towards Dover; where they boast</div>
                              <div class="line">To have well-armed friends.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORNWALL</div>
                              <div class="line">Get horses for your mistress.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell, sweet lord, and sister.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORNWALL</div>
                              <div class="line">Edmund, farewell.</div>
                              <p>Exeunt GONERIL, EDMUND, and OSWALD</p>
                              <div class="line">Go seek the traitor Gloucester,</div>
                              <div class="line">Pinion him like a thief, bring him before us.</div>
                              <p>Exeunt other Servants</p>
                              <div class="line">Though well we may not pass upon his life</div>
                              <div class="line">Without the form of justice, yet our power</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall do a courtesy to our wrath, which men</div>
                              <div class="line">May blame, but not control. Who's there? the traitor?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter GLOUCESTER, brought in by two or three</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Ingrateful fox! 'tis he.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORNWALL</div>
                              <div class="line">Bind fast his corky arms.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">What mean your graces? Good my friends, consider</div>
                              <div class="line">You are my guests: do me no foul play, friends.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORNWALL</div>
                              <div class="line">Bind him, I say.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Servants bind him</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Hard, hard. O filthy traitor!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Unmerciful lady as you are, I'm none.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORNWALL</div>
                              <div class="line">To this chair bind him. Villain, thou shalt find--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>REGAN plucks his beard</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">By the kind gods, 'tis most ignobly done</div>
                              <div class="line">To pluck me by the beard.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">So white, and such a traitor!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Naughty lady,</div>
                              <div class="line">These hairs, which thou dost ravish from my chin,</div>
                              <div class="line">Will quicken, and accuse thee: I am your host:</div>
                              <div class="line">With robbers' hands my hospitable favours</div>
                              <div class="line">You should not ruffle thus. What will you do?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORNWALL</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, sir, what letters had you late from France?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Be simple answerer, for we know the truth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORNWALL</div>
                              <div class="line">And what confederacy have you with the traitors</div>
                              <div class="line">Late footed in the kingdom?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">To whose hands have you sent the lunatic king? Speak.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">I have a letter guessingly set down,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which came from one that's of a neutral heart,</div>
                              <div class="line">And not from one opposed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORNWALL</div>
                              <div class="line">Cunning.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">And false.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORNWALL</div>
                              <div class="line">Where hast thou sent the king?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">To Dover.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherefore to Dover? Wast thou not charged at peril--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORNWALL</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherefore to Dover? Let him first answer that.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">I am tied to the stake, and I must stand the course.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherefore to Dover, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Because I would not see thy cruel nails</div>
                              <div class="line">Pluck out his poor old eyes; nor thy fierce sister</div>
                              <div class="line">In his anointed flesh stick boarish fangs.</div>
                              <div class="line">The sea, with such a storm as his bare head</div>
                              <div class="line">In hell-black night endured, would have buoy'd up,</div>
                              <div class="line">And quench'd the stelled fires:</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet, poor old heart, he holp the heavens to rain.</div>
                              <div class="line">If wolves had at thy gate howl'd that stern time,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou shouldst have said 'Good porter, turn the key,'</div>
                              <div class="line">All cruels else subscribed: but I shall see</div>
                              <div class="line">The winged vengeance overtake such children.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORNWALL</div>
                              <div class="line">See't shalt thou never. Fellows, hold the chair.</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon these eyes of thine I'll set my foot.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">He that will think to live till he be old,</div>
                              <div class="line">Give me some help! O cruel! O you gods!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">One side will mock another; the other too.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORNWALL</div>
                              <div class="line">If you see vengeance,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">Hold your hand, my lord:</div>
                              <div class="line">I have served you ever since I was a child;</div>
                              <div class="line">But better service have I never done you</div>
                              <div class="line">Than now to bid you hold.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, you dog!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">If you did wear a beard upon your chin,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'd shake it on this quarrel. What do you mean?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORNWALL</div>
                              <div class="line">My villain!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>They draw and fight</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, then, come on, and take the chance of anger.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Give me thy sword. A peasant stand up thus!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Takes a sword, and runs at him behind</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">O, I am slain! My lord, you have one eye left</div>
                              <div class="line">To see some mischief on him. O!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Dies</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORNWALL</div>
                              <div class="line">Lest it see more, prevent it. Out, vile jelly!</div>
                              <div class="line">Where is thy lustre now?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">All dark and comfortless. Where's my son Edmund?</div>
                              <div class="line">Edmund, enkindle all the sparks of nature,</div>
                              <div class="line">To quit this horrid act.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Out, treacherous villain!</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou call'st on him that hates thee: it was he</div>
                              <div class="line">That made the overture of thy treasons to us;</div>
                              <div class="line">Who is too good to pity thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">O my follies! then Edgar was abused.</div>
                              <div class="line">Kind gods, forgive me that, and prosper him!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Go thrust him out at gates, and let him smell</div>
                              <div class="line">His way to Dover.</div>
                              <p>Exit one with GLOUCESTER</p>
                              <div class="line">How is't, my lord? how look you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORNWALL</div>
                              <div class="line">I have received a hurt: follow me, lady.</div>
                              <div class="line">Turn out that eyeless villain; throw this slave</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon the dunghill. Regan, I bleed apace:</div>
                              <div class="line">Untimely comes this hurt: give me your arm.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit CORNWALL, led by REGAN</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll never care what wickedness I do,</div>
                              <div class="line">If this man come to good.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">If she live long,</div>
                              <div class="line">And in the end meet the old course of death,</div>
                              <div class="line">Women will all turn monsters.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">Let's follow the old earl, and get the Bedlam</div>
                              <div class="line">To lead him where he would: his roguish madness</div>
                              <div class="line">Allows itself to any thing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">Go thou: I'll fetch some flax and whites of eggs</div>
                              <div class="line">To apply to his bleeding face. Now, heaven help him!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt severally</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.6">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 4. ACT IV</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.2">1. SCENE I. The heath.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.3">2. SCENE II. Before ALBANY's palace.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.4">3. SCENE III. The French camp near Dover.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.5">4. SCENE IV. The same. A tent.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.6">5. SCENE V. Gloucester's castle.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.7">6. SCENE VI. Fields near Dover.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.8">7. SCENE VII. A tent in the French camp. LEAR on a bed asleep, soft
                music playing; Gentleman, and others attending.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I. The heath.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter EDGAR</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet better thus, and known to be contemn'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">Than still contemn'd and flatter'd. To be worst,</div>
                              <div class="line">The lowest and most dejected thing of fortune,</div>
                              <div class="line">Stands still in esperance, lives not in fear:</div>
                              <div class="line">The lamentable change is from the best;</div>
                              <div class="line">The worst returns to laughter. Welcome, then,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou unsubstantial air that I embrace!</div>
                              <div class="line">The wretch that thou hast blown unto the worst</div>
                              <div class="line">Owes nothing to thy blasts. But who comes here?</div>
                              <p>Enter GLOUCESTER, led by an Old Man</p>
                              <div class="line">My father, poorly led? World, world, O world!</div>
                              <div class="line">But that thy strange mutations make us hate thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">Lie would not yield to age.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Old Man</div>
                              <div class="line">O, my good lord, I have been your tenant, and</div>
                              <div class="line">your father's tenant, these fourscore years.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Away, get thee away; good friend, be gone:</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy comforts can do me no good at all;</div>
                              <div class="line">Thee they may hurt.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Old Man</div>
                              <div class="line">Alack, sir, you cannot see your way.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">I have no way, and therefore want no eyes;</div>
                              <div class="line">I stumbled when I saw: full oft 'tis seen,</div>
                              <div class="line">Our means secure us, and our mere defects</div>
                              <div class="line">Prove our commodities. O dear son Edgar,</div>
                              <div class="line">The food of thy abused father's wrath!</div>
                              <div class="line">Might I but live to see thee in my touch,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'ld say I had eyes again!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Old Man</div>
                              <div class="line">How now! Who's there?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span> O gods! Who is't can
                        say 'I am at</div>
                              <div class="line">the worst'?</div>
                              <div class="line">I am worse than e'er I was.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Old Man</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis poor mad Tom.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span> And worse I may be
                        yet: the worst is not</div>
                              <div class="line">So long as we can say 'This is the worst.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Old Man</div>
                              <div class="line">Fellow, where goest?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Is it a beggar-man?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Old Man</div>
                              <div class="line">Madman and beggar too.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">He has some reason, else he could not beg.</div>
                              <div class="line">I' the last night's storm I such a fellow saw;</div>
                              <div class="line">Which made me think a man a worm: my son</div>
                              <div class="line">Came then into my mind; and yet my mind</div>
                              <div class="line">Was then scarce friends with him: I have heard</div>
                              <div class="line">more since.</div>
                              <div class="line">As flies to wanton boys, are we to the gods.</div>
                              <div class="line">They kill us for their sport.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span> How should this be?</div>
                              <div class="line">Bad is the trade that must play fool to sorrow,</div>
                              <div class="line">Angering itself and others.--Bless thee, master!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Is that the naked fellow?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Old Man</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Then, prithee, get thee gone: if, for my sake,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou wilt o'ertake us, hence a mile or twain,</div>
                              <div class="line">I' the way toward Dover, do it for ancient love;</div>
                              <div class="line">And bring some covering for this naked soul,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who I'll entreat to lead me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Old Man</div>
                              <div class="line">Alack, sir, he is mad.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis the times' plague, when madmen lead the blind.</div>
                              <div class="line">Do as I bid thee, or rather do thy pleasure;</div>
                              <div class="line">Above the rest, be gone.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Old Man</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll bring him the best 'parel that I have,</div>
                              <div class="line">Come on't what will.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Sirrah, naked fellow,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Poor Tom's a-cold.</div>
                              <p>Aside</p>
                              <div class="line">I cannot daub it further.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Come hither, fellow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span> And yet I
                        must.--Bless thy sweet eyes, they bleed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Know'st thou the way to Dover?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Both stile and gate, horse-way and foot-path. Poor</div>
                              <div class="line">Tom hath been scared out of his good wits: bless</div>
                              <div class="line">thee, good man's son, from the foul fiend! five</div>
                              <div class="line">fiends have been in poor Tom at once; of lust, as</div>
                              <div class="line">Obidicut; Hobbididence, prince of dumbness; Mahu, of</div>
                              <div class="line">stealing; Modo, of murder; Flibbertigibbet, of</div>
                              <div class="line">mopping and mowing, who since possesses chambermaids</div>
                              <div class="line">and waiting-women. So, bless thee, master!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, take this purse, thou whom the heavens' plagues</div>
                              <div class="line">Have humbled to all strokes: that I am wretched</div>
                              <div class="line">Makes thee the happier: heavens, deal so still!</div>
                              <div class="line">Let the superfluous and lust-dieted man,</div>
                              <div class="line">That slaves your ordinance, that will not see</div>
                              <div class="line">Because he doth not feel, feel your power quickly;</div>
                              <div class="line">So distribution should undo excess,</div>
                              <div class="line">And each man have enough. Dost thou know Dover?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, master.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">There is a cliff, whose high and bending head</div>
                              <div class="line">Looks fearfully in the confined deep:</div>
                              <div class="line">Bring me but to the very brim of it,</div>
                              <div class="line">And I'll repair the misery thou dost bear</div>
                              <div class="line">With something rich about me: from that place</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall no leading need.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Give me thy arm:</div>
                              <div class="line">Poor Tom shall lead thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II. Before ALBANY's palace.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter GONERIL and EDMUND</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">Welcome, my lord: I marvel our mild husband</div>
                              <div class="line">Not met us on the way.</div>
                              <p>Enter OSWALD</p>
                              <div class="line">Now, where's your master'?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OSWALD</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, within; but never man so changed.</div>
                              <div class="line">I told him of the army that was landed;</div>
                              <div class="line">He smiled at it: I told him you were coming:</div>
                              <div class="line">His answer was 'The worse:' of Gloucester's treachery,</div>
                              <div class="line">And of the loyal service of his son,</div>
                              <div class="line">When I inform'd him, then he call'd me sot,</div>
                              <div class="line">And told me I had turn'd the wrong side out:</div>
                              <div class="line">What most he should dislike seems pleasant to him;</div>
                              <div class="line">What like, offensive.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>To EDMUND</span> Then shall you go
                        no further.</div>
                              <div class="line">It is the cowish terror of his spirit,</div>
                              <div class="line">That dares not undertake: he'll not feel wrongs</div>
                              <div class="line">Which tie him to an answer. Our wishes on the way</div>
                              <div class="line">May prove effects. Back, Edmund, to my brother;</div>
                              <div class="line">Hasten his musters and conduct his powers:</div>
                              <div class="line">I must change arms at home, and give the distaff</div>
                              <div class="line">Into my husband's hands. This trusty servant</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall pass between us: ere long you are like to hear,</div>
                              <div class="line">If you dare venture in your own behalf,</div>
                              <div class="line">A mistress's command. Wear this; spare speech;</div>
                              <p>Giving a favour</p>
                              <div class="line">Decline your head: this kiss, if it durst speak,</div>
                              <div class="line">Would stretch thy spirits up into the air:</div>
                              <div class="line">Conceive, and fare thee well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">Yours in the ranks of death.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">My most dear Gloucester!</div>
                              <p>Exit EDMUND</p>
                              <div class="line">O, the difference of man and man!</div>
                              <div class="line">To thee a woman's services are due:</div>
                              <div class="line">My fool usurps my body.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OSWALD</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, here comes my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <p>Enter ALBANY</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">I have been worth the whistle.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">O Goneril!</div>
                              <div class="line">You are not worth the dust which the rude wind</div>
                              <div class="line">Blows in your face. I fear your disposition:</div>
                              <div class="line">That nature, which contemns its origin,</div>
                              <div class="line">Cannot be border'd certain in itself;</div>
                              <div class="line">She that herself will sliver and disbranch</div>
                              <div class="line">From her material sap, perforce must wither</div>
                              <div class="line">And come to deadly use.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">No more; the text is foolish.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Wisdom and goodness to the vile seem vile:</div>
                              <div class="line">Filths savour but themselves. What have you done?</div>
                              <div class="line">Tigers, not daughters, what have you perform'd?</div>
                              <div class="line">A father, and a gracious aged man,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose reverence even the head-lugg'd bear would lick,</div>
                              <div class="line">Most barbarous, most degenerate! have you madded.</div>
                              <div class="line">Could my good brother suffer you to do it?</div>
                              <div class="line">A man, a prince, by him so benefited!</div>
                              <div class="line">If that the heavens do not their visible spirits</div>
                              <div class="line">Send quickly down to tame these vile offences,</div>
                              <div class="line">It will come,</div>
                              <div class="line">Humanity must perforce prey on itself,</div>
                              <div class="line">Like monsters of the deep.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">Milk-liver'd man!</div>
                              <div class="line">That bear'st a cheek for blows, a head for wrongs;</div>
                              <div class="line">Who hast not in thy brows an eye discerning</div>
                              <div class="line">Thine honour from thy suffering; that not know'st</div>
                              <div class="line">Fools do those villains pity who are punish'd</div>
                              <div class="line">Ere they have done their mischief. Where's thy drum?</div>
                              <div class="line">France spreads his banners in our noiseless land;</div>
                              <div class="line">With plumed helm thy slayer begins threats;</div>
                              <div class="line">Whiles thou, a moral fool, sit'st still, and criest</div>
                              <div class="line">'Alack, why does he so?'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">See thyself, devil!</div>
                              <div class="line">Proper deformity seems not in the fiend</div>
                              <div class="line">So horrid as in woman.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">O vain fool!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou changed and self-cover'd thing, for shame,</div>
                              <div class="line">Be-monster not thy feature. Were't my fitness</div>
                              <div class="line">To let these hands obey my blood,</div>
                              <div class="line">They are apt enough to dislocate and tear</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy flesh and bones: howe'er thou art a fiend,</div>
                              <div class="line">A woman's shape doth shield thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, your manhood now--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter a Messenger</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">What news?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">O, my good lord, the Duke of Cornwall's dead:</div>
                              <div class="line">Slain by his servant, going to put out</div>
                              <div class="line">The other eye of Gloucester.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Gloucester's eye!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">A servant that he bred, thrill'd with remorse,</div>
                              <div class="line">Opposed against the act, bending his sword</div>
                              <div class="line">To his great master; who, thereat enraged,</div>
                              <div class="line">Flew on him, and amongst them fell'd him dead;</div>
                              <div class="line">But not without that harmful stroke, which since</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath pluck'd him after.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">This shows you are above,</div>
                              <div class="line">You justicers, that these our nether crimes</div>
                              <div class="line">So speedily can venge! But, O poor Gloucester!</div>
                              <div class="line">Lost he his other eye?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">Both, both, my lord.</div>
                              <div class="line">This letter, madam, craves a speedy answer;</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis from your sister.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span> One way I like this
                        well;</div>
                              <div class="line">But being widow, and my Gloucester with her,</div>
                              <div class="line">May all the building in my fancy pluck</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon my hateful life: another way,</div>
                              <div class="line">The news is not so tart.--I'll read, and answer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Where was his son when they did take his eyes?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">Come with my lady hither.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">He is not here.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">No, my good lord; I met him back again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Knows he the wickedness?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, my good lord; 'twas he inform'd against him;</div>
                              <div class="line">And quit the house on purpose, that their punishment</div>
                              <div class="line">Might have the freer course.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Gloucester, I live</div>
                              <div class="line">To thank thee for the love thou show'dst the king,</div>
                              <div class="line">And to revenge thine eyes. Come hither, friend:</div>
                              <div class="line">Tell me what more thou know'st.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III. The French camp near Dover.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter KENT and a Gentleman</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">Why the King of France is so suddenly gone back</div>
                              <div class="line">know you the reason?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Something he left imperfect in the</div>
                              <div class="line">state, which since his coming forth is thought</div>
                              <div class="line">of; which imports to the kingdom so much</div>
                              <div class="line">fear and danger, that his personal return was</div>
                              <div class="line">most required and necessary.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">Who hath he left behind him general?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">The Marshal of France, Monsieur La Far.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">Did your letters pierce the queen to any</div>
                              <div class="line">demonstration of grief?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, sir; she took them, read them in my presence;</div>
                              <div class="line">And now and then an ample tear trill'd down</div>
                              <div class="line">Her delicate cheek: it seem'd she was a queen</div>
                              <div class="line">Over her passion; who, most rebel-like,</div>
                              <div class="line">Sought to be king o'er her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">O, then it moved her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Not to a rage: patience and sorrow strove</div>
                              <div class="line">Who should express her goodliest. You have seen</div>
                              <div class="line">Sunshine and rain at once: her smiles and tears</div>
                              <div class="line">Were like a better way: those happy smilets,</div>
                              <div class="line">That play'd on her ripe lip, seem'd not to know</div>
                              <div class="line">What guests were in her eyes; which parted thence,</div>
                              <div class="line">As pearls from diamonds dropp'd. In brief,</div>
                              <div class="line">Sorrow would be a rarity most beloved,</div>
                              <div class="line">If all could so become it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">Made she no verbal question?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">'Faith, once or twice she heaved the name of 'father'</div>
                              <div class="line">Pantingly forth, as if it press'd her heart:</div>
                              <div class="line">Cried 'Sisters! sisters! Shame of ladies! sisters!</div>
                              <div class="line">Kent! father! sisters! What, i' the storm? i' the night?</div>
                              <div class="line">Let pity not be believed!' There she shook</div>
                              <div class="line">The holy water from her heavenly eyes,</div>
                              <div class="line">And clamour moisten'd: then away she started</div>
                              <div class="line">To deal with grief alone.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">It is the stars,</div>
                              <div class="line">The stars above us, govern our conditions;</div>
                              <div class="line">Else one self mate and mate could not beget</div>
                              <div class="line">Such different issues. You spoke not with her since?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">No.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">Was this before the king return'd?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">No, since.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, sir, the poor distressed Lear's i' the town;</div>
                              <div class="line">Who sometime, in his better tune, remembers</div>
                              <div class="line">What we are come about, and by no means</div>
                              <div class="line">Will yield to see his daughter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, good sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">A sovereign shame so elbows him: his own unkindness,</div>
                              <div class="line">That stripp'd her from his benediction, turn'd her</div>
                              <div class="line">To foreign casualties, gave her dear rights</div>
                              <div class="line">To his dog-hearted daughters, these things sting</div>
                              <div class="line">His mind so venomously, that burning shame</div>
                              <div class="line">Detains him from Cordelia.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Alack, poor gentleman!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">Of Albany's and Cornwall's powers you heard not?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis so, they are afoot.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, sir, I'll bring you to our master Lear,</div>
                              <div class="line">And leave you to attend him: some dear cause</div>
                              <div class="line">Will in concealment wrap me up awhile;</div>
                              <div class="line">When I am known aright, you shall not grieve</div>
                              <div class="line">Lending me this acquaintance. I pray you, go</div>
                              <div class="line">Along with me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.5">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>4. SCENE IV. The same. A tent.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter, with drum and colours, CORDELIA, Doctor, and Soldiers</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORDELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Alack, 'tis he: why, he was met even now</div>
                              <div class="line">As mad as the vex'd sea; singing aloud;</div>
                              <div class="line">Crown'd with rank fumiter and furrow-weeds,</div>
                              <div class="line">With bur-docks, hemlock, nettles, cuckoo-flowers,</div>
                              <div class="line">Darnel, and all the idle weeds that grow</div>
                              <div class="line">In our sustaining corn. A century send forth;</div>
                              <div class="line">Search every acre in the high-grown field,</div>
                              <div class="line">And bring him to our eye.</div>
                              <p>Exit an Officer</p>
                              <div class="line">What can man's wisdom</div>
                              <div class="line">In the restoring his bereaved sense?</div>
                              <div class="line">He that helps him take all my outward worth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Doctor</div>
                              <div class="line">There is means, madam:</div>
                              <div class="line">Our foster-nurse of nature is repose,</div>
                              <div class="line">The which he lacks; that to provoke in him,</div>
                              <div class="line">Are many simples operative, whose power</div>
                              <div class="line">Will close the eye of anguish.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORDELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">All blest secrets,</div>
                              <div class="line">All you unpublish'd virtues of the earth,</div>
                              <div class="line">Spring with my tears! be aidant and remediate</div>
                              <div class="line">In the good man's distress! Seek, seek for him;</div>
                              <div class="line">Lest his ungovern'd rage dissolve the life</div>
                              <div class="line">That wants the means to lead it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter a Messenger</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">News, madam;</div>
                              <div class="line">The British powers are marching hitherward.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORDELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis known before; our preparation stands</div>
                              <div class="line">In expectation of them. O dear father,</div>
                              <div class="line">It is thy business that I go about;</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore great France</div>
                              <div class="line">My mourning and important tears hath pitied.</div>
                              <div class="line">No blown ambition doth our arms incite,</div>
                              <div class="line">But love, dear love, and our aged father's right:</div>
                              <div class="line">Soon may I hear and see him!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.6">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>5. SCENE V. Gloucester's castle.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter REGAN and OSWALD</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">But are my brother's powers set forth?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OSWALD</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, madam.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Himself in person there?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OSWALD</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, with much ado:</div>
                              <div class="line">Your sister is the better soldier.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Lord Edmund spake not with your lord at home?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OSWALD</div>
                              <div class="line">No, madam.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">What might import my sister's letter to him?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OSWALD</div>
                              <div class="line">I know not, lady.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">'Faith, he is posted hence on serious matter.</div>
                              <div class="line">It was great ignorance, Gloucester's eyes being out,</div>
                              <div class="line">To let him live: where he arrives he moves</div>
                              <div class="line">All hearts against us: Edmund, I think, is gone,</div>
                              <div class="line">In pity of his misery, to dispatch</div>
                              <div class="line">His nighted life: moreover, to descry</div>
