                              <div class="line">Tell me--but truly--but then speak the truth,</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you not love my sister?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">In honour'd love.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">But have you never found my brother's way</div>
                              <div class="line">To the forfended place?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">That thought abuses you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">I am doubtful that you have been conjunct</div>
                              <div class="line">And bosom'd with her, as far as we call hers.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">No, by mine honour, madam.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">I never shall endure her: dear my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">Be not familiar with her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">Fear me not:</div>
                              <div class="line">She and the duke her husband!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter, with drum and colours, ALBANY, GONERIL, and Soldiers</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span> I had rather lose the
                        battle than that sister</div>
                              <div class="line">Should loosen him and me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Our very loving sister, well be-met.</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, this I hear; the king is come to his daughter,</div>
                              <div class="line">With others whom the rigor of our state</div>
                              <div class="line">Forced to cry out. Where I could not be honest,</div>
                              <div class="line">I never yet was valiant: for this business,</div>
                              <div class="line">It toucheth us, as France invades our land,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not bolds the king, with others, whom, I fear,</div>
                              <div class="line">Most just and heavy causes make oppose.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, you speak nobly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Why is this reason'd?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">Combine together 'gainst the enemy;</div>
                              <div class="line">For these domestic and particular broils</div>
                              <div class="line">Are not the question here.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Let's then determine</div>
                              <div class="line">With the ancient of war on our proceedings.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall attend you presently at your tent.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Sister, you'll go with us?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">No.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis most convenient; pray you, go with us.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span> O, ho, I know the
                        riddle.--I will go.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>As they are going out, enter EDGAR disguised</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">If e'er your grace had speech with man so poor,</div>
                              <div class="line">Hear me one word.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll overtake you. Speak.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt all but ALBANY and EDGAR</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Before you fight the battle, ope this letter.</div>
                              <div class="line">If you have victory, let the trumpet sound</div>
                              <div class="line">For him that brought it: wretched though I seem,</div>
                              <div class="line">I can produce a champion that will prove</div>
                              <div class="line">What is avouched there. If you miscarry,</div>
                              <div class="line">Your business of the world hath so an end,</div>
                              <div class="line">And machination ceases. Fortune love you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Stay till I have read the letter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">I was forbid it.</div>
                              <div class="line">When time shall serve, let but the herald cry,</div>
                              <div class="line">And I'll appear again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, fare thee well: I will o'erlook thy paper.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit EDGAR</p>
                        <p>Re-enter EDMUND</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">The enemy's in view; draw up your powers.</div>
                              <div class="line">Here is the guess of their true strength and forces</div>
                              <div class="line">By diligent discovery; but your haste</div>
                              <div class="line">Is now urged on you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">We will greet the time.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">To both these sisters have I sworn my love;</div>
                              <div class="line">Each jealous of the other, as the stung</div>
                              <div class="line">Are of the adder. Which of them shall I take?</div>
                              <div class="line">Both? one? or neither? Neither can be enjoy'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">If both remain alive: to take the widow</div>
                              <div class="line">Exasperates, makes mad her sister Goneril;</div>
                              <div class="line">And hardly shall I carry out my side,</div>
                              <div class="line">Her husband being alive. Now then we'll use</div>
                              <div class="line">His countenance for the battle; which being done,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let her who would be rid of him devise</div>
                              <div class="line">His speedy taking off. As for the mercy</div>
                              <div class="line">Which he intends to Lear and to Cordelia,</div>
                              <div class="line">The battle done, and they within our power,</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall never see his pardon; for my state</div>
                              <div class="line">Stands on me to defend, not to debate.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.7.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II. A field between the two camps.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Alarum within. Enter, with drum and colours, KING LEAR, CORDELIA,
                and Soldiers, over the stage; and exeunt</p>
                        <p>Enter EDGAR and GLOUCESTER</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, father, take the shadow of this tree</div>
                              <div class="line">For your good host; pray that the right may thrive:</div>
                              <div class="line">If ever I return to you again,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll bring you comfort.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">Grace go with you, sir!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit EDGAR</p>
                        <p>Alarum and retreat within. Re-enter EDGAR</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Away, old man; give me thy hand; away!</div>
                              <div class="line">King Lear hath lost, he and his daughter ta'en:</div>
                              <div class="line">Give me thy hand; come on.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">No farther, sir; a man may rot even here.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">What, in ill thoughts again? Men must endure</div>
                              <div class="line">Their going hence, even as their coming hither;</div>
                              <div class="line">Ripeness is all: come on.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                              <div class="line">And that's true too.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.7.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III. The British camp near Dover.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter, in conquest, with drum and colours, EDMUND, KING LEAR and
                CORDELIA, prisoners; Captain, Soldiers, &c</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">Some officers take them away: good guard,</div>
                              <div class="line">Until their greater pleasures first be known</div>
                              <div class="line">That are to censure them.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORDELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">We are not the first</div>
                              <div class="line">Who, with best meaning, have incurr'd the worst.</div>
                              <div class="line">For thee, oppressed king, am I cast down;</div>
                              <div class="line">Myself could else out-frown false fortune's frown.</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall we not see these daughters and these sisters?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">No, no, no, no! Come, let's away to prison:</div>
                              <div class="line">We two alone will sing like birds i' the cage:</div>
                              <div class="line">When thou dost ask me blessing, I'll kneel down,</div>
                              <div class="line">And ask of thee forgiveness: so we'll live,</div>
                              <div class="line">And pray, and sing, and tell old tales, and laugh</div>
                              <div class="line">At gilded butterflies, and hear poor rogues</div>
                              <div class="line">Talk of court news; and we'll talk with them too,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who loses and who wins; who's in, who's out;</div>
                              <div class="line">And take upon's the mystery of things,</div>
                              <div class="line">As if we were God's spies: and we'll wear out,</div>
                              <div class="line">In a wall'd prison, packs and sects of great ones,</div>
                              <div class="line">That ebb and flow by the moon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">Take them away.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon such sacrifices, my Cordelia,</div>
                              <div class="line">The gods themselves throw incense. Have I caught thee?</div>
                              <div class="line">He that parts us shall bring a brand from heaven,</div>
                              <div class="line">And fire us hence like foxes. Wipe thine eyes;</div>
                              <div class="line">The good-years shall devour them, flesh and fell,</div>
                              <div class="line">Ere they shall make us weep: we'll see 'em starve</div>
                              <div class="line">first. Come.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt KING LEAR and CORDELIA, guarded</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">Come hither, captain; hark.</div>
                              <div class="line">Take thou this note;</div>
                              <p>Giving a paper</p>
                              <div class="line">go follow them to prison:</div>
                              <div class="line">One step I have advanced thee; if thou dost</div>
                              <div class="line">As this instructs thee, thou dost make thy way</div>
                              <div class="line">To noble fortunes: know thou this, that men</div>
                              <div class="line">Are as the time is: to be tender-minded</div>
                              <div class="line">Does not become a sword: thy great employment</div>
                              <div class="line">Will not bear question; either say thou'lt do 't,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or thrive by other means.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Captain</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll do 't, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">About it; and write happy when thou hast done.</div>
                              <div class="line">Mark, I say, instantly; and carry it so</div>
                              <div class="line">As I have set it down.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Captain</div>
                              <div class="line">I cannot draw a cart, nor eat dried oats;</div>
                              <div class="line">If it be man's work, I'll do 't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <p>Flourish. Enter ALBANY, GONERIL, REGAN, another Captain, and
                Soldiers</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, you have shown to-day your valiant strain,</div>
                              <div class="line">And fortune led you well: you have the captives</div>
                              <div class="line">That were the opposites of this day's strife:</div>
                              <div class="line">We do require them of you, so to use them</div>
                              <div class="line">As we shall find their merits and our safety</div>
                              <div class="line">May equally determine.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, I thought it fit</div>
                              <div class="line">To send the old and miserable king</div>
                              <div class="line">To some retention and appointed guard;</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose age has charms in it, whose title more,</div>
                              <div class="line">To pluck the common bosom on his side,</div>
                              <div class="line">An turn our impress'd lances in our eyes</div>
                              <div class="line">Which do command them. With him I sent the queen;</div>
                              <div class="line">My reason all the same; and they are ready</div>
                              <div class="line">To-morrow, or at further space, to appear</div>
                              <div class="line">Where you shall hold your session. At this time</div>
                              <div class="line">We sweat and bleed: the friend hath lost his friend;</div>
                              <div class="line">And the best quarrels, in the heat, are cursed</div>
                              <div class="line">By those that feel their sharpness:</div>
                              <div class="line">The question of Cordelia and her father</div>
                              <div class="line">Requires a fitter place.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, by your patience,</div>
                              <div class="line">I hold you but a subject of this war,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not as a brother.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">That's as we list to grace him.</div>
                              <div class="line">Methinks our pleasure might have been demanded,</div>
                              <div class="line">Ere you had spoke so far. He led our powers;</div>
                              <div class="line">Bore the commission of my place and person;</div>
                              <div class="line">The which immediacy may well stand up,</div>
                              <div class="line">And call itself your brother.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">Not so hot:</div>
                              <div class="line">In his own grace he doth exalt himself,</div>
                              <div class="line">More than in your addition.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">In my rights,</div>
                              <div class="line">By me invested, he compeers the best.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">That were the most, if he should husband you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Jesters do oft prove prophets.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">Holla, holla!</div>
                              <div class="line">That eye that told you so look'd but a-squint.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Lady, I am not well; else I should answer</div>
                              <div class="line">From a full-flowing stomach. General,</div>
                              <div class="line">Take thou my soldiers, prisoners, patrimony;</div>
                              <div class="line">Dispose of them, of me; the walls are thine:</div>
                              <div class="line">Witness the world, that I create thee here</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord and master.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">Mean you to enjoy him?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">The let-alone lies not in your good will.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor in thine, lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Half-blooded fellow, yes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>To EDMUND</span> Let the drum
                        strike, and prove my title thine.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Stay yet; hear reason. Edmund, I arrest thee</div>
                              <div class="line">On capital treason; and, in thine attaint,</div>
                              <div class="line">This gilded serpent</div>
                              <p>Pointing to Goneril</p>
                              <div class="line">For your claim, fair sister,</div>
                              <div class="line">I bar it in the interest of my wife:</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis she is sub-contracted to this lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">And I, her husband, contradict your bans.</div>
                              <div class="line">If you will marry, make your loves to me,</div>
                              <div class="line">My lady is bespoke.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">An interlude!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art arm'd, Gloucester: let the trumpet sound:</div>
                              <div class="line">If none appear to prove upon thy head</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy heinous, manifest, and many treasons,</div>
                              <div class="line">There is my pledge;</div>
                              <p>Throwing down a glove</p>
                              <div class="line">I'll prove it on thy heart,</div>
                              <div class="line">Ere I taste bread, thou art in nothing less</div>
                              <div class="line">Than I have here proclaim'd thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Sick, O, sick!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span> If not, I'll ne'er
                        trust medicine.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">There's my exchange:</div>
                              <p>Throwing down a glove</p>
                              <div class="line">what in the world he is</div>
                              <div class="line">That names me traitor, villain-like he lies:</div>
                              <div class="line">Call by thy trumpet: he that dares approach,</div>
                              <div class="line">On him, on you, who not? I will maintain</div>
                              <div class="line">My truth and honour firmly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">A herald, ho!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">A herald, ho, a herald!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Trust to thy single virtue; for thy soldiers,</div>
                              <div class="line">All levied in my name, have in my name</div>
                              <div class="line">Took their discharge.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REGAN</div>
                              <div class="line">My sickness grows upon me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">She is not well; convey her to my tent.</div>
                              <p>Exit Regan, led</p>
                              <p>Enter a Herald</p>
                              <div class="line">Come hither, herald,--Let the trumpet sound,</div>
                              <div class="line">And read out this.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Captain</div>
                              <div class="line">Sound, trumpet!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>A trumpet sounds</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Herald</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Reads</span> 'If any man of
                        quality or degree within</div>
                              <div class="line">the lists of the army will maintain upon Edmund,</div>
                              <div class="line">supposed Earl of Gloucester, that he is a manifold</div>
                              <div class="line">traitor, let him appear by the third sound of the</div>
                              <div class="line">trumpet: he is bold in his defence.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">Sound!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>First trumpet</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Herald</div>
                              <div class="line">Again!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Second trumpet</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Herald</div>
                              <div class="line">Again!</div>
                              <p>Third trumpet</p>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Trumpet answers within</p>
                        <p>Enter EDGAR, at the third sound, armed, with a trumpet before him</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Ask him his purposes, why he appears</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon this call o' the trumpet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Herald</div>
                              <div class="line">What are you?</div>
                              <div class="line">Your name, your quality? and why you answer</div>
                              <div class="line">This present summons?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Know, my name is lost;</div>
                              <div class="line">By treason's tooth bare-gnawn and canker-bit:</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet am I noble as the adversary</div>
                              <div class="line">I come to cope.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Which is that adversary?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">What's he that speaks for Edmund Earl of Gloucester?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">Himself: what say'st thou to him?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Draw thy sword,</div>
                              <div class="line">That, if my speech offend a noble heart,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy arm may do thee justice: here is mine.</div>
                              <div class="line">Behold, it is the privilege of mine honours,</div>
                              <div class="line">My oath, and my profession: I protest,</div>
                              <div class="line">Maugre thy strength, youth, place, and eminence,</div>
                              <div class="line">Despite thy victor sword and fire-new fortune,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy valour and thy heart, thou art a traitor;</div>
                              <div class="line">False to thy gods, thy brother, and thy father;</div>
                              <div class="line">Conspirant 'gainst this high-illustrious prince;</div>
                              <div class="line">And, from the extremest upward of thy head</div>
                              <div class="line">To the descent and dust below thy foot,</div>
                              <div class="line">A most toad-spotted traitor. Say thou 'No,'</div>
                              <div class="line">This sword, this arm, and my best spirits, are bent</div>
                              <div class="line">To prove upon thy heart, whereto I speak,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou liest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">In wisdom I should ask thy name;</div>
                              <div class="line">But, since thy outside looks so fair and warlike,</div>
                              <div class="line">And that thy tongue some say of breeding breathes,</div>
                              <div class="line">What safe and nicely I might well delay</div>
                              <div class="line">By rule of knighthood, I disdain and spurn:</div>
                              <div class="line">Back do I toss these treasons to thy head;</div>
                              <div class="line">With the hell-hated lie o'erwhelm thy heart;</div>
                              <div class="line">Which, for they yet glance by and scarcely bruise,</div>
                              <div class="line">This sword of mine shall give them instant way,</div>
                              <div class="line">Where they shall rest for ever. Trumpets, speak!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Alarums. They fight. EDMUND falls</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Save him, save him!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">This is practise, Gloucester:</div>
                              <div class="line">By the law of arms thou wast not bound to answer</div>
                              <div class="line">An unknown opposite; thou art not vanquish'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">But cozen'd and beguiled.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Shut your mouth, dame,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or with this paper shall I stop it: Hold, sir:</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou worse than any name, read thine own evil:</div>
                              <div class="line">No tearing, lady: I perceive you know it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Gives the letter to EDMUND</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">Say, if I do, the laws are mine, not thine:</div>
                              <div class="line">Who can arraign me for't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Most monstrous! oh!</div>
                              <div class="line">Know'st thou this paper?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONERIL</div>
                              <div class="line">Ask me not what I know.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Go after her: she's desperate; govern her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">What you have charged me with, that have I done;</div>
                              <div class="line">And more, much more; the time will bring it out:</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis past, and so am I. But what art thou</div>
                              <div class="line">That hast this fortune on me? If thou'rt noble,</div>
                              <div class="line">I do forgive thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Let's exchange charity.</div>
                              <div class="line">I am no less in blood than thou art, Edmund;</div>
                              <div class="line">If more, the more thou hast wrong'd me.</div>
                              <div class="line">My name is Edgar, and thy father's son.</div>
                              <div class="line">The gods are just, and of our pleasant vices</div>
                              <div class="line">Make instruments to plague us:</div>
                              <div class="line">The dark and vicious place where thee he got</div>
                              <div class="line">Cost him his eyes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou hast spoken right, 'tis true;</div>
                              <div class="line">The wheel is come full circle: I am here.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Methought thy very gait did prophesy</div>
                              <div class="line">A royal nobleness: I must embrace thee:</div>
                              <div class="line">Let sorrow split my heart, if ever I</div>
                              <div class="line">Did hate thee or thy father!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Worthy prince, I know't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Where have you hid yourself?</div>
                              <div class="line">How have you known the miseries of your father?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">By nursing them, my lord. List a brief tale;</div>
                              <div class="line">And when 'tis told, O, that my heart would burst!</div>
                              <div class="line">The bloody proclamation to escape,</div>
                              <div class="line">That follow'd me so near,--O, our lives' sweetness!</div>
                              <div class="line">That we the pain of death would hourly die</div>
                              <div class="line">Rather than die at once!--taught me to shift</div>
                              <div class="line">Into a madman's rags; to assume a semblance</div>
                              <div class="line">That very dogs disdain'd: and in this habit</div>
                              <div class="line">Met I my father with his bleeding rings,</div>
                              <div class="line">Their precious stones new lost: became his guide,</div>
                              <div class="line">Led him, begg'd for him, saved him from despair;</div>
                              <div class="line">Never,--O fault!--reveal'd myself unto him,</div>
                              <div class="line">Until some half-hour past, when I was arm'd:</div>
                              <div class="line">Not sure, though hoping, of this good success,</div>
                              <div class="line">I ask'd his blessing, and from first to last</div>
                              <div class="line">Told him my pilgrimage: but his flaw'd heart,</div>
                              <div class="line">Alack, too weak the conflict to support!</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twixt two extremes of passion, joy and grief,</div>
                              <div class="line">Burst smilingly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">This speech of yours hath moved me,</div>
                              <div class="line">And shall perchance do good: but speak you on;</div>
                              <div class="line">You look as you had something more to say.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">If there be more, more woeful, hold it in;</div>
                              <div class="line">For I am almost ready to dissolve,</div>
                              <div class="line">Hearing of this.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">This would have seem'd a period</div>
                              <div class="line">To such as love not sorrow; but another,</div>
                              <div class="line">To amplify too much, would make much more,</div>
                              <div class="line">And top extremity.</div>
                              <div class="line">Whilst I was big in clamour came there in a man,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who, having seen me in my worst estate,</div>
                              <div class="line">Shunn'd my abhorr'd society; but then, finding</div>
                              <div class="line">Who 'twas that so endured, with his strong arms</div>
                              <div class="line">He fastened on my neck, and bellow'd out</div>
                              <div class="line">As he'ld burst heaven; threw him on my father;</div>
                              <div class="line">Told the most piteous tale of Lear and him</div>
                              <div class="line">That ever ear received: which in recounting</div>
                              <div class="line">His grief grew puissant and the strings of life</div>
                              <div class="line">Began to crack: twice then the trumpets sounded,</div>
                              <div class="line">And there I left him tranced.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">But who was this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Kent, sir, the banish'd Kent; who in disguise</div>
                              <div class="line">Follow'd his enemy king, and did him service</div>
                              <div class="line">Improper for a slave.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter a Gentleman, with a bloody knife</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Help, help, O, help!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">What kind of help?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Speak, man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">What means that bloody knife?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis hot, it smokes;</div>
                              <div class="line">It came even from the heart of--O, she's dead!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Who dead? speak, man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Your lady, sir, your lady: and her sister</div>
                              <div class="line">By her is poisoned; she hath confess'd it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">I was contracted to them both: all three</div>
                              <div class="line">Now marry in an instant.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Here comes Kent.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Produce their bodies, be they alive or dead:</div>
                              <div class="line">This judgment of the heavens, that makes us tremble,</div>
                              <div class="line">Touches us not with pity.</div>
                              <p>Exit Gentleman</p>
                              <p>Enter KENT</p>
                              <div class="line">O, is this he?</div>
                              <div class="line">The time will not allow the compliment</div>
                              <div class="line">Which very manners urges.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">I am come</div>
                              <div class="line">To bid my king and master aye good night:</div>
                              <div class="line">Is he not here?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Great thing of us forgot!</div>
                              <div class="line">Speak, Edmund, where's the king? and where's Cordelia?</div>
                              <div class="line">See'st thou this object, Kent?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>The bodies of GONERIL and REGAN are brought in</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">Alack, why thus?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet Edmund was beloved:</div>
                              <div class="line">The one the other poison'd for my sake,</div>
                              <div class="line">And after slew herself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Even so. Cover their faces.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">I pant for life: some good I mean to do,</div>
                              <div class="line">Despite of mine own nature. Quickly send,</div>
                              <div class="line">Be brief in it, to the castle; for my writ</div>
                              <div class="line">Is on the life of Lear and on Cordelia:</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, send in time.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Run, run, O, run!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">To who, my lord? Who hath the office? send</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy token of reprieve.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">Well thought on: take my sword,</div>
                              <div class="line">Give it the captain.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Haste thee, for thy life.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit EDGAR</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDMUND</div>
                              <div class="line">He hath commission from thy wife and me</div>
                              <div class="line">To hang Cordelia in the prison, and</div>
                              <div class="line">To lay the blame upon her own despair,</div>
                              <div class="line">That she fordid herself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">The gods defend her! Bear him hence awhile.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>EDMUND is borne off</p>
                        <p>Re-enter KING LEAR, with CORDELIA dead in his arms; EDGAR,
                Captain, and others following</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Howl, howl, howl, howl! O, you are men of stones:</div>
                              <div class="line">Had I your tongues and eyes, I'ld use them so</div>
                              <div class="line">That heaven's vault should crack. She's gone for ever!</div>
                              <div class="line">I know when one is dead, and when one lives;</div>
                              <div class="line">She's dead as earth. Lend me a looking-glass;</div>
                              <div class="line">If that her breath will mist or stain the stone,</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, then she lives.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">Is this the promised end</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Or image of that horror?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">Fall, and cease!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">This feather stirs; she lives! if it be so,</div>
                              <div class="line">It is a chance which does redeem all sorrows</div>
                              <div class="line">That ever I have felt.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Kneeling</span> O my good
                    master!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, away.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis noble Kent, your friend.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">A plague upon you, murderers, traitors all!</div>
                              <div class="line">I might have saved her; now she's gone for ever!</div>
                              <div class="line">Cordelia, Cordelia! stay a little. Ha!</div>
                              <div class="line">What is't thou say'st? Her voice was ever soft,</div>
                              <div class="line">Gentle, and low, an excellent thing in woman.</div>
                              <div class="line">I kill'd the slave that was a-hanging thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Captain</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis true, my lords, he did.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Did I not, fellow?</div>
                              <div class="line">I have seen the day, with my good biting falchion</div>
                              <div class="line">I would have made them skip: I am old now,</div>
                              <div class="line">And these same crosses spoil me. Who are you?</div>
                              <div class="line">Mine eyes are not o' the best: I'll tell you straight.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">If fortune brag of two she loved and hated,</div>
                              <div class="line">One of them we behold.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">This is a dull sight. Are you not Kent?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">The same,</div>
                              <div class="line">Your servant Kent: Where is your servant Caius?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">He's a good fellow, I can tell you that;</div>
                              <div class="line">He'll strike, and quickly too: he's dead and rotten.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">No, my good lord; I am the very man,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll see that straight.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">That, from your first of difference and decay,</div>
                              <div class="line">Have follow'd your sad steps.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">You are welcome hither.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor no man else: all's cheerless, dark, and deadly.</div>
                              <div class="line">Your eldest daughters have fordone them selves,</div>
                              <div class="line">And desperately are dead.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, so I think.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">He knows not what he says: and vain it is</div>
                              <div class="line">That we present us to him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Very bootless.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter a Captain</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Captain</div>
                              <div class="line">Edmund is dead, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALBANY</div>
                              <div class="line">That's but a trifle here.</div>
                              <div class="line">You lords and noble friends, know our intent.</div>
                              <div class="line">What comfort to this great decay may come</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall be applied: for us we will resign,</div>
                              <div class="line">During the life of this old majesty,</div>
                              <div class="line">To him our absolute power:</div>
                              <p>To EDGAR and KENT</p>
                              <div class="line">you, to your rights:</div>
                              <div class="line">With boot, and such addition as your honours</div>
                              <div class="line">Have more than merited. All friends shall taste</div>
                              <div class="line">The wages of their virtue, and all foes</div>
                              <div class="line">The cup of their deservings. O, see, see!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING LEAR</div>
                              <div class="line">And my poor fool is hang'd! No, no, no life!</div>
                              <div class="line">Why should a dog, a horse, a rat, have life,</div>
                              <div class="line">And thou no breath at all? Thou'lt come no more,</div>
                              <div class="line">Never, never, never, never, never!</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray you, undo this button: thank you, sir.</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you see this? Look on her, look, her lips,</div>
                              <div class="line">Look there, look there!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Dies</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">He faints! My lord, my lord!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">Break, heart; I prithee, break!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Look up, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KENT</div>
                              <div class="line">Vex not his ghost: O, let him pass! he hates him much</div>
                              <div class="line">That would upon the rack of this tough world</div>
                              <div class="line">Stretch him out longer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDGAR</div>
                              <div class="line">He is gone, indeed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
